atk-s0517a:19_0: Yo sabbabhūtesu munīva aggo, anantasaṅkhesu jinattajesu;
atk-s0517a:26_0: Pāṭho visiṭṭho paṭisambhidānaṃ, maggoti tannāmavisesito ca.
atk-s0517a:30_0: Atthaṃ apubbaṃ anuvaṇṇayanto, suttañca yuttiñca anukkamanto.
atk-s0517a:31_0: Avokkamanto samayā sakā ca, anāmasanto samayaṃ parañca;
atk-s0517a:34_0: Sakkacca saddhammapakāsiniṃ taṃ, suṇātha dhāretha ca sādhu santoti.
atk-s0517a:35_0: Tattha paṭisambhidānaṃ maggoti tannāmavisesito cāti vuttattā paṭisambhidāmaggassa paṭisambhidāmaggatā tāva vattabbā.
atk-s0517a:35_10: Nānābhedabhinnānañhi dhammānaṃ nānābhedabhinnā desanā sotūnaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ paṭisambhidāñāṇappabhedañca sañjaneti,
atk-s0517a:35_11: puthujjanānaṃ āyatiṃ paṭisambhidāñāṇappabhedāya ca paccayo hoti.
atk-s0517a:36_5: ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttattā na aññassa kassaci pabhedā,
atk-s0517a:37_1: Tañhi yasmā hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyati pāpuṇīyati,
atk-s0517a:37_5: kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā atthoti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:37_6: Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:38_1: So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
atk-s0517a:38_3: Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu,
atk-s0517a:38_5: akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammoti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:38_6: Taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:40_0: “Ye dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0517a:40_2: yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0517a:43_1: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
atk-s0517a:43_3: So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho,
atk-s0517a:44_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0517a:44_2: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti…pe…
atk-s0517a:44_6: tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”tiādinā nayena vibhajitvā vibhajitvā dassito.
atk-s0517a:45_0: Tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti abyabhicārivohāro,
atk-s0517a:45_1: tassa abhilāpe bhāsane udīraṇe taṃ lapitaṃ bhāsitaṃ udīritaṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0517a:45_3: ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti evaṃ tassā dhammaniruttisaññitāya sabhāvaniruttiyā māgadhikāya sabbasattānaṃ
atk-s0517a:45_10: “phassā”ti vā “phassa”nti vā vutte pana “ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0517a:45_12: Aññaṃ panesa nāmākhyātaupasagganipātabyañjanasaddaṃ jānāti na jānātīti?
atk-s0517a:45_16: Taṃ pana nayidaṃ paṭisambhidākiccanti paṭikkhipitvā “bhāsaṃ nāma sattā uggaṇhantī”ti vatvā idaṃ kathitaṃ –
atk-s0517a:45_17: mātāpitaro hi daharakāle kumārake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nipajjāpetvā taṃ taṃ kathayamānā tāni tāni kiccāni karonti,
atk-s0517a:45_18: dārakā tesaṃ taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ vavatthāpenti “iminā idaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:45_20: Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbampi bhāsaṃ jānanti.
atk-s0517a:45_23: Tesaṃ jātadārako sace mātu kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ suṇāti,
atk-s0517a:45_27: Ubhinnampi pana kathaṃ asuṇanto māgadhikabhāsaṃ bhāsissati.
atk-s0517a:46_2: sopi attano dhammatāya vacanaṃ samuṭṭhāpento māgadhikabhāsameva bhāsissati.
atk-s0517a:46_3: Niraye tiracchānayoniyaṃ pettivisaye manussaloke devaloketi sabbattha māgadhikabhāsāva ussannā.
atk-s0517a:46_6: Sammāsambuddhopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tantiṃ āropento māgadhikabhāsāya eva āropesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0517a:46_8: Māgadhikabhāsāya hi tantiṃ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ sotapathāgamanameva papañco.
atk-s0517a:46_9: Sote pana saṅghaṭṭitamatteyeva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:46_10: Aññāya pana bhāsāya tantiṃ āruḷhakaṃ pothetvā pothetvā uggahetabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:46_11: Bahumpi uggahetvā pana puthujjanassa paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi,
atk-s0517a:47_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbatthakañāṇamārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ ñāṇe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:47_1: yathāvuttesu vā tesu tīsu ñāṇesu gocarakiccādivasena vitthāragataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:48_0: Imā pana catasso paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0517a:48_4: Tattha sāriputtattherassa mahāmoggallānattherassa mahākassapattherassa mahākaccāyanattherassa mahākoṭṭhitattherassāti
atk-s0517a:48_5: evamādīnaṃ asītiyāpi mahātherānaṃ paṭisambhidā asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatā,
atk-s0517a:48_10: khujjuttarāya upāsikāyātievamādīnaṃ paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:49_10: Sakkaccaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā dhammaṃ suṇantassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
atk-s0517a:49_12: Uggahitapāḷiādīsu hi atthaṃ paripucchantassa paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
atk-s0517a:49_13: Pubbayogo nāma pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane yogāvacaratā gatapaccāgatikabhāvena yāva anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ pattavipassanānuyogo.
atk-s0517a:50_0: Etesu pana kāraṇesu pariyatti savanaṃ paripucchāti imāni tīṇi pabhedasseva balavakāraṇāni.
atk-s0517a:50_4: Pariyattisavanaparipucchā hi pubbe hontu vā mā vā,
atk-s0517a:50_5: pubbayogena pana pubbe ceva etarahi ca saṅkhārasammasanaṃ vinā paṭisambhidā nāma natthi.
atk-s0517a:50_6: Ime pana dvepi ekato hutvā paṭisambhidā upatthambhetvā visadā karontīti.
atk-s0517a:54_1: Bāhusaccaṃ nāma tesu tesu satthesu ca sippāyatanesu ca kusalatā.
atk-s0517a:54_4: Āgamo nāma antamaso opammavaggamattassapi buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:54_6: Adhigamo nāma sotāpannatā vā sakadāgāmitā vā anāgāmitā vā arahattaṃ vā.
atk-s0517a:54_7: Garusannissayo nāma sutapaṭibhānabahulānaṃ garūnaṃ santike vāso.
atk-s0517a:55_0: Tattha buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca pubbayogañceva adhigamañca nissāya paṭisambhidā pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0517a:55_2: Paṭisambhidāppattiyā ca pāṭiyekko kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogo nāma natthi,
atk-s0517a:55_5: Tathāgatānañhi dasa balāni viya ariyānaṃ ariyaphaleheva paṭisambhidā ijjhantīti.
atk-s0517a:55_8: pakārena karīyante vuccante ettha nānābhedabhinnā gambhīrā atthā iti pakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:56_0: Tadetaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggappakaraṇaṃ atthasampannaṃ byañjanasampannaṃ gambhīraṃ gambhīratthaṃ lokuttarappakāsanaṃ
atk-s0517a:56_3: assāsajananatthaṃ tappaṭipakkhanāsanatthañca gambhīratthānañca anekesaṃ suttantapadānaṃ atthavivaraṇena
atk-s0517a:56_7: lokānukampakena satthukappena dhammarājassa dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitaṃ sutvā
atk-s0517a:56_8: āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle yathāsutameva saṅgītiṃ āropitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:57_0: Tadetaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ.
atk-s0517a:57_1: Dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu mahānikāyesu khuddakamahānikāyapariyāpannaṃ.
atk-s0517a:57_2: Suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallanti navasu satthu sāsanaṅgesu
atk-s0517a:59_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0517a:60_0: Dhammabhaṇḍāgārikattherena pana pañcasu ṭhānesu etadaggaṃ āropitena paṭiññātānaṃ caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassānaṃ
atk-s0517a:60_6: Ekekasmiṃ vaggasmiṃ dasadasakaṃ katvā ñāṇakathādikā mātikākathāpariyosānā samatiṃsa kathā.
atk-s0517a:60_7: Evamanekadhā vavatthāpitassa imassa paṭisambhidāmaggappakaraṇassa anupubbaṃ apubbapadatthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0517a:60_8: Imañhi pakaraṇaṃ pāṭhato atthato uddisantena ca niddisantena ca sakkaccaṃ uddisitabbaṃ niddisitabbañca,
atk-s0517a:60_11: Gambhīrattā imassa pakaraṇassa lokahitāya loke ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ.
atk-s0517a:61_0: Tattha samatiṃsāya kathāsu ñāṇakathā kasmā ādito kathitāti ce?
atk-s0517a:63_0: Ujukā diṭṭhīti hi sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmāpi ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:66_0: Pubbaṅgamabhūtāya hi sammādiṭṭhiyā siddhāya micchādiṭṭhīnampi micchādiṭṭhibhāvaṃ jānissatīti sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0517a:66_1: ñāṇaṃ tāva sodhetuṃ ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:68_0: Pubbantāparantadiṭṭhiyo ṭhapetvā ñāṇasseva vuttattā ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:70_0: Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇaparappavādānaṃ vāde ṭhapetvā ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa desitattā,
atk-s0517a:70_1: aṭṭhaṅgike ca magge sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa padhānattā ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:72_12: paññāya ca naṃ paṭivijjha passatī”ti ca –
atk-s0517a:73_0: “Idha tathāgato loke uppajjati…pe… so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇa”nti ādīni ca –
atk-s0517a:74_0: Anekāni suttantapadāni anulomentena sutamaye ñāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā yathākkamena ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:75_0: Sā panāyaṃ ñāṇakathā uddesaniddesavasena dvidhā ṭhitā.
atk-s0517a:75_1: Uddese “sotāvadhāne paññā sutamaye ñāṇa”ntiādinā nayena tesattati ñāṇāni mātikāvasena uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:75_4: taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇa”ntiādinā nayena tāniyeva tesattati ñāṇāni vitthāravasena niddiṭṭhānīti.
atk-s0517a:80_1: Tattha uddese tāva sotāvadhāne paññā sutamaye ñāṇanti ettha sotasaddo anekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0517a:83_0: “Sotāyatanaṃ sotadhātu sotindriya”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ sotasaddo maṃsasote dissati.
atk-s0517a:83_3: “Yāni sotāni lokasminti yāni etāni sotāni mayā kittitāni pakittitāni ācikkhitāni desitāni paññapitāni
atk-s0517a:83_6: taṇhāsoto diṭṭhisoto kilesasoto duccaritasoto avijjāsoto”tiādīsu taṇhādīsu pañcasu dhammesu.
atk-s0517a:83_7: “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu udakadhārāyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:83_11: “Purisassa ca viññāṇasotaṃ pajānāti ubhayato abbocchinnaṃ idha loke patiṭṭhitañca paraloke patiṭṭhitañcā”tiādīsu cittasantatiyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:83_14: karaṇabhūtena vā avadhīyati avatthāpīyati appīyatīti sotāvadhānaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Sutaṃ.
atk-s0517a:83_15: Sutañca nāma “bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo”tiādīsu viya sotadvārānusārena viññātaṃ avadhāritaṃ dhammajātaṃ,
atk-s0517a:83_17: Tasmiṃ sotāvadhānasaṅkhāte sute pavattā paññā sotāvadhāne paññā.
atk-s0517a:83_18: Paññāti ca tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena paññā,
atk-s0517a:83_19: tena tena vā aniccādinā pakārena dhamme jānātītipi paññā.
atk-s0517a:84_0: Sutamaye ñāṇanti ettha sutasaddo tāva saupasaggo anupasaggo ca –
atk-s0517a:87_7: Idha panassa sotadvārānusārena viññātaṃ upadhāritanti attho.
atk-s0517a:87_8: Sutamaye ñāṇanti yā esā etaṃ sutaṃ viññātaṃ avadhāritaṃ saddhammaṃ ārabbha ārammaṇaṃ katvā sabbapaṭhamañca aparāparañca pavattā paññā,
atk-s0517a:87_14: “Natthi attakāre natthi parakāre natthi purisakāre”tiādīsu paccattavacanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:88_0: Atha vā sutena pakato phassādiko dhammapuñjo sutamayo,
atk-s0517a:88_1: tasmiṃ sutamaye dhammapuñje pavattaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:88_3: Taṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pariyāyavacanena adhippāyapakāsanatthaṃ aniyamena “paññā”ti vatvā pacchā adhippetaṃ “ñāṇa”nti niyametvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:88_11: Lakkhaṇādīsu hi sabhāvo vā sāmaññaṃ vā lakkhaṇaṃ nāma,
atk-s0517a:88_12: kiccaṃ vā sampatti vā raso nāma,
atk-s0517a:88_13: upaṭṭhānākāro vā phalaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma,
atk-s0517a:90_0: Pātimokkho satī ceva, ñāṇaṃ khanti tatheva ca;
atk-s0517a:92_0: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato”ti āgato pātimokkhasaṃvaro.
atk-s0517a:92_1: “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
atk-s0517a:92_2: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0517a:92_5: cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”tiādinā nayena āgato satisaṃvaro.
atk-s0517a:96_5: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”tiādinā nayena āgato paccayapaṭisevanāsaṃvaro,
atk-s0517a:96_7: “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarisapasamphassānaṃ duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ
atk-s0517a:96_8: vacanapathānaṃ uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ
atk-s0517a:96_10: “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametī”tiādinā nayena āgato vīriyasaṃvaro.
atk-s0517a:96_11: “Idha ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappetī”ti āgato ājīvapārisuddhisaṃvaro,
atk-s0517a:96_13: Tesu sattasu saṃvaresu pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvaraājīvapārisuddhipaccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātā cattāro saṃvarā idhādhippetā,
atk-s0517a:96_15: Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaroti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:96_16: Sutamayañāṇe vuttaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā saṃvarantassa saṃvaraṃ karontassa tasmiṃ saṃvare pavattā taṃsampayuttā paññā “sutvāna saṃvare paññā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0517a:96_17: Atha vā hetuatthe sutvāti vacanassa sambhavato sutahetunā saṃvare paññātipi attho.
atk-s0517a:97_0: Sīlamaye ñāṇanti ettha sīlanti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ.
atk-s0517a:97_6: Etadeva hi ettha atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇavidū anujānanti.
atk-s0517a:97_7: Aññe pana “adhisevanaṭṭhena ācāraṭṭhena tassīlaṭṭhena siraṭṭhena sītalaṭṭhena sivaṭṭhena sīla”nti vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0517a:100_0: Yathā hi nīlapītādibhedena anekadhā bhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nīlādibhedena bhinnassāpi sanidassanabhāvānatikkamanato,
atk-s0517a:100_1: tathā sīlassa cetanādibhedena anekadhā bhinnassāpi yadetaṃ kāyakammādīnaṃ samādhānavasena kusalānañca dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ sīlanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:103_0: Tasmā idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma kiccaṭṭhena rasena dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ,
atk-s0517a:106_0: Tayidaṃ sīlaṃ “kāyasoceyyaṃ vacīsoceyyaṃ manosoceyya”nti evaṃ vuttasoceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:106_2: Hirottappañca pana tassa viññūhi padaṭṭhānanti vaṇṇitaṃ,
atk-s0517a:106_4: Hirottappe hi sati sīlaṃ uppajjati ceva tiṭṭhati ca,
atk-s0517a:106_5: asati neva uppajjati na tiṭṭhatīti evaṃvidhena sīlena sahagataṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ sīlamaye ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:107_1: Saṃvaritvā samādahane paññāti sīlamayañāṇe vuttasīlasaṃvarena saṃvaritvā saṃvaraṃ katvā sīle patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0517a:107_2: samādahantassa upacārappanāvasena cittekaggataṃ karontassa tasmiṃ samādahane pavattā taṃsampayuttā paññā.
atk-s0517a:107_3: Samaṃ sammā ca ādahanaṃ ṭhapananti ca samādahanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:108_4: Ekārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ sammā ca ādhānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:108_6: Tasmā yassa dhammassānubhāvena ekārammaṇe cittacetasikā samaṃ sammā ca avikkhipamānā avippakiṇṇā ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0517a:112_1: Paccayapariggahe paññāti ettha paṭicca phalametīti paccayo.
atk-s0517a:112_4: Etīti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti attho.
atk-s0517a:112_6: tassa paccayassa bahuvidhattā paccayānaṃ pariggahe vavatthāpane ca paññā paccayapariggahe paññā.
atk-s0517a:113_1: Ayañhi “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāve dissati.
atk-s0517a:115_0: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti. –
atk-s0517a:117_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0517a:118_0: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti. –
atk-s0517a:119_3: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇa”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:119_11: Atthato pana attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti vā,
atk-s0517a:119_14: attano paripūrakaṃ apāyesu apatamānaṃ dhārentīti vā,
atk-s0517a:119_16: cittena avadhārīyantīti vā yathāyogaṃ dhammāti vuccanti.
atk-s0517a:119_17: Idha pana attano paccayehi dhārīyantīti dhammā,
atk-s0517a:119_18: paccayasamuppannā dhammā tiṭṭhanti uppajjanti ceva pavattanti ca etāyāti dhammaṭṭhiti,
atk-s0517a:119_21: Idañhi samādhibhāvanāmayañāṇe vuttasamādhinā samāhitena cittena yathābhūtañāṇadassanatthāya yogamārabhitvā
atk-s0517a:119_22: vavatthāpitanāmarūpassa tesaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ paccayapariggahapariyāyaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:119_23: “Nāmarūpavavatthāne ñāṇa”nti avatvā eva kasmā “dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti vuttanti ce?
atk-s0517a:119_25: Paccayasamuppanne hi apariggahite paccayapariggaho na sakkā hoti kātuṃ.
atk-s0517a:119_26: Tasmā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇagahaṇeneva tassa hetubhūtaṃ pubbe siddhaṃ nāmarūpavavatthānañāṇaṃ vuttameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:119_27: Kasmā dutiyatatiyañāṇaṃ viya “samādahitvā paccayapariggahe paññā”ti na vuttanti ce?
atk-s0517a:120_0: “Samādahitvā yathā ce vipassati, vipassamāno tathā ce samādahe;
atk-s0517a:121_0: Vipassanā ca samatho tadā ahu, samānabhāgā yuganaddhā vattare”ti. –
atk-s0517a:122_1: Tasmā samādhiṃ avissajjetvā samādhiñca ñāṇañca yuganaddhaṃ katvā yāva ariyamaggo,
atk-s0517a:122_2: tāva ussukkāpetabbanti ñāpanatthaṃ “paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”micceva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:123_1: Atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññāti ettha attano sabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0517a:123_2: uppādādikkhaṇaṃ vā patvā ati itā atikkantāti atītā,
atk-s0517a:123_3: tadubhayampi na āgatā na sampattāti anāgatā,
atk-s0517a:123_4: taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca uppādādiuddhaṃ pannā gatā pavattāti paccuppannā.
atk-s0517a:123_6: Tesaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammānaṃ ekekakkhandhalakkhaṇe saṅkhipitvā kalāpavasena
atk-s0517a:123_7: rāsiṃ katvā vavatthāne nicchayane sanniṭṭhāpane paññā.
atk-s0517a:124_0: Sammasane ñāṇanti sammā āmasane anumajjane pekkhaṇe ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:124_2: Idañhi nāmarūpavavatthānañāṇānantaraṃ nāmarūpapaccayapariggahe dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇe ṭhitassa “yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ
atk-s0517a:124_3: atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre
atk-s0517a:124_10: ekaṃ sammasana”ntiādinā nayena vuttasammasanavasena pubbe vavatthāpite ekekasmiṃ khandhe tilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:124_11: āropetvā aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa kalāpasammasanañāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:125_1: Paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipariṇāmānupassane paññāti santativasena paccuppannānaṃ ajjhattaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammānaṃ
atk-s0517a:125_3: Yasmā “ime dhammā uppajjitvā bhijjantī”ti udayaṃ gahetvāpi bhedeyeva cittaṃ ṭhapeti,
atk-s0517a:125_4: tasmā avuttopi udayo vuttoyeva hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:125_5: Paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ dassanena vā udayadassanassa siddhattā udayo vuttoyeva hoti.
atk-s0517a:125_6: Na hi udayaṃ vinā dhammānaṃ uppannattaṃ sijjhati,
atk-s0517a:125_7: tasmā “paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādavipariṇāmānupassane paññā”ti avuttepi vuttameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:125_8: “Udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti niyamitattā ca udayadassanaṃ siddhameva hotīti anantaraṃ vuttassa sammasanañāṇassa
atk-s0517a:125_9: pāraṃ gantvā taṃsammasaneyeva pākaṭībhūte udayabbaye pariggaṇhitvā saṅkhārānaṃ paricchedakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:126_1: Ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti rūpakkhandhādiārammaṇaṃ bhaṅgato paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā passitvā.
atk-s0517a:126_2: Bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇanti tassa ārammaṇaṃ bhaṅgato paṭisaṅkhāya uppannassa ñāṇassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassane yā paññā,
atk-s0517a:126_7: ārammaṇassa paṭisaṅkhā jānanā passanāti vuttanayeneva ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā “bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:126_8: Yasmā pana bhaṅgānupassanāya eva vipassanā sikhaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0517a:126_11: tasmā tassā siddhāya taṃ siddhameva hotīti taṃ avatvāva bhaṅgānupassanāya eva vipassanāsikhaṃ ñāṇaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:126_12: Udayabbayānupassanāya suparidiṭṭhaudayabbayassa suparicchinnesu saṅkhāresu lahuṃ lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu
atk-s0517a:126_13: ñāṇe tikkhe vahante udayaṃ pahāya bhaṅge eva sati santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0517a:126_14: tassa “evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ nāma saṅkhārā bhijjantī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:127_1: Bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññāti uppādapavattanimittaāyūhanāpaṭisandhīnaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāne pīḷāyogato sappaṭibhayavasena gahaṇūpagamane paññāti attho.
atk-s0517a:127_4: Atha vā bhayato upatiṭṭhatīti bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ, paññā,
atk-s0517a:128_5: byañjanameva nāna”nti vuttattā ekamiva vuccamānampi avatthābhedena muñcitukamyatādi viya tividhameva hoti.
atk-s0517a:128_6: Tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānaādīnavānupassanāsu siddhāsu nibbidānupassanā siddhā hotīti katvā avuttāpi vuttāva hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:129_0: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgārammaṇaṃ bhaṅgānupassanaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa tibhavacatuyonipañcagatisattaviññāṇaṭṭhitinavasattāvāsesu
atk-s0517a:129_5: anāgatāpi evameva nirujjhissantī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:129_6: Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu
atk-s0517a:129_7: neva tāṇaṃ na leṇaṃ na gati na paṭisaraṇaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0517a:129_8: sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatesu saṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārepi patthanā vā parāmāso vā na hoti,
atk-s0517a:129_14: sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nava ca sattāvāsā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā viya ca,
atk-s0517a:129_15: sabbe saṅkhārā gaṇḍabhūtā rogabhūtā sallabhūtā aghabhūtā ābādhabhūtā viya ca nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0517a:129_16: sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa ramaṇīyākārasaṇṭhitampi savāḷakamiva vanagahanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:129_24: Yathā hi so puriso etāni savāḷakavanagahanādīni āgamma bhīto saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto samantato ādīnavameva passati,
atk-s0517a:129_25: evameva so yogāvacaro bhaṅgānupassanāvasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu samantato nirasaṃ nirassādaṃ ādīnavameva passati.
atk-s0517a:130_0: So evaṃ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato sampassanto sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagate sabhedake saṅkhāragate nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramati.
atk-s0517a:130_1: Seyyathāpi nāma cittakūṭapabbatapādābhirato suvaṇṇarājahaṃso asucimhi caṇḍālagāmadvāraāvāṭe nābhiramati,
atk-s0517a:130_3: evameva ayaṃ yogīrājahaṃso suparidiṭṭhādīnave sabhedake saṅkhāragate nābhiramati,
atk-s0517a:130_4: bhāvanārāmatāya pana bhāvanāratiyā samannāgatattā sattasu anupassanāsuyeva abhiramati.
atk-s0517a:130_5: Yathā ca suvaṇṇapañjarepi pakkhitto sīho migarājā nābhiramati,
atk-s0517a:130_9: Yathā ca sabbaseto sattappatiṭṭho iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo chaddanto nāgarājā nagaramajjhe nābhiramati,
atk-s0517a:131_1: Muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇanti muñcituṃ cajituṃ kāmeti icchatīti muñcitukāmo,
atk-s0517a:131_7: Muñcitukamyatā ca sā paṭisaṅkhā ca santiṭṭhanā cāti muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā.
atk-s0517a:131_8: Iti pubbabhāge nibbidāñāṇena nibbinnassa uppādādīni pariccajitukāmatā muñcitukamyatā.
atk-s0517a:131_11: Evaṃ avatthābhedena tippakārā paññā saṅkhārānaṃ ajjhupekkhanāsu ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:131_13: icchantena pana “paññā”ti ca “saṅkhārupekkhāsū”ti ca bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0517a:131_14: avatthābhedena bhinnassāpi ekattā “ñāṇa”nti ekavacanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:131_16: “yā ca muñcitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā,
atk-s0517a:131_19: Keci pana “saṅkhārupekkhāsūti bahuvacanaṃ samathavipassanāvasena saṅkhārupekkhānaṃ bahuttā”tipi vadanti.
atk-s0517a:131_21: Avatthābhedena pana tena nibbidāñāṇena nibbindantassa ukkaṇṭhantassa sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagatesu
atk-s0517a:131_22: sabhedakesu saṅkhāresu cittaṃ na sajjati na laggati na bajjhati,
atk-s0517a:132_8: sapattaparikkhitto purisotievamādayo tato tato muccitukāmā nissaritukāmāva honti,
atk-s0517a:132_9: evaṃ tassa yogino cittaṃ sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmaṃ nissaritukāmaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:132_11: Evañca sati “uppādaṃ muñcitukamyatā”tiādīsu “uppādā muccitukamyatā”tiādi vattabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:132_13: Athassa sabbasaṅkhāresu vigatālayassa sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ muñcitukāmassa muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:132_14: So evaṃ sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagate sabhedake saṅkhāre muñcitukāmo muñcanassa upāyasampādanatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:132_15: puna te eva saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassati.
atk-s0517a:132_16: Evañhi vipassato cassa aniccavasena nimittaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:132_19: So paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena “sabbe saṅkhārā suññā”ti disvā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0517a:132_20: bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya bhariyāya dosaṃ disvā vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso tassā bhariyāya saṅkhāresu
atk-s0517a:132_23: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato tīsu bhavesu cittaṃ patilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivattati na sampasāriyati.
atk-s0517a:132_24: Seyyathāpi nāma padumapalāse īsakaṃ poṇe udakaphusitāni patilīyanti paṭikuṭanti paṭivattanti na sampasāriyanti.
atk-s0517a:132_25: Seyyathāpi vā pana kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nhārudaddulaṃ vā aggimhi pakkhittaṃ patilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0517a:132_26: evaṃ tassa tīsu bhavesu cittaṃ patilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0517a:132_29: Iminā saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇena saddhiṃ upari gotrabhuñāṇassa sādhakaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ pubbāparañāṇehi avuttampi vuttameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:133_2: bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0517a:133_3: anulomikāya khantiyā asamannāgato sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0517a:133_4: sammattaniyāmaṃ anokkamamāno sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:137_0: “Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:138_0: Tassa hi taṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa adhimokkhasaddhā balavatarā hoti,
atk-s0517a:138_5: Tassa idāni maggo uppajjissatīti saṅkhārupekkhāya saṅkhāre “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti vā “anattā”ti vā sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.
atk-s0517a:138_6: Bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayeneva saṅkhāre “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti vā “anattā”ti vā ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:138_7: Tadanantaraṃ tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṃ katvā dve tīṇi cattāri vā javanacittāni uppajjanti.
atk-s0517a:138_9: Tañhi purimānañca aṭṭhannaṃ vipassanāñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya anulometi,
atk-s0517a:138_10: upari ca pattabbānaṃ sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ anulometi.
atk-s0517a:138_11: Yathā hi dhammiko rājā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisinno aṭṭhannaṃ vohārikamahāmattānaṃ vinicchayaṃ sutvā agatigamanaṃ
atk-s0517a:138_12: pahāya majjhatto hutvā “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodamāno tesañca vinicchayassa anulometi,
atk-s0517a:138_17: yathā rājā “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodamāno vohārikānañca vinicchayassa rājadhammassa ca anulometi,
atk-s0517a:138_18: evamidaṃ aniccādivasena saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjamānānaṃ aṭṭhannañca vipassanāñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya anulometi,
atk-s0517a:139_1: Bahiddhā vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā gotrabhuñāṇanti ettha bahiddhāti saṅkhāranimittaṃ.
atk-s0517a:139_2: Tañhi ajjhattacittasantāne akusalakkhandhe upādāya bahiddhāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:139_3: Tasmā bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittamhā vuṭṭhāti vigataṃ hutvā uddhaṃ tiṭṭhatīti vuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:140_1: nibbānārammaṇato pana nimittā vuṭṭhātīti ekato vuṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0517a:141_1: Idañhi anulomañāṇehi padumapalāsato udakamiva sabbasaṅkhārato patilīyamānacittassa anulomañāṇassa āsevanante
atk-s0517a:141_2: animittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ puthujjanasaṅkhaṃ puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkamamānaṃ
atk-s0517a:142_1: Dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇanti ettha dubhatoti ubhato,
atk-s0517a:142_3: Kilesānaṃ samucchindanato kilesehi ca tadanuvattakakkhandhehi ca nibbānārammaṇakaraṇato bahiddhā sabbasaṅkhāranimittehi
atk-s0517a:142_4: ca vuṭṭhāti vivaṭṭatīti dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā.
atk-s0517a:143_1: samudayassa samucchindanato pavattā vuṭṭhahantīti dubhato vuṭṭhānāni hontī”ti.
atk-s0517a:144_2: kilese vā mārento gacchati pavattatīti maggo,
atk-s0517a:144_5: Tañhi gotrabhuñāṇassa anantaraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ sayaṃvajjhe kilese niravasesaṃ samucchindamānaṃ
atk-s0517a:144_7: kurumānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ micchāmaggaṃ pajahamānaṃ sabbaverabhayāni vūpasamayamānaṃ sammāsambuddhassa orasaputtabhāvamupanayamānaṃ
atk-s0517a:144_8: aññāni ca anekāni ānisaṃsasatāni paṭilābhayamānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:145_0: Ṭhātuṃ icchaṃ puriso, laṅghitvā mātikāya paratīre;
atk-s0517a:147_0: Rajjuṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā, ullaṅghitvāna pāraninnatanu;
atk-s0517a:148_0: Pārāpanno pana taṃ, muñciya vedhaṃ patiṭṭhahati pāre.
atk-s0517a:150_0: Diṭṭhabhayo abhaye pana, ṭhātuṃ icchaṃ amatapāre.
atk-s0517a:155_0: Taṃ muñciya gotrabhunā, aladdhaāsevanena tu pavedhaṃ;
atk-s0517a:159_0: Candaṃ passeyya naro, yathā tathevānulomañāṇehi kamā;
atk-s0517a:160_0: Saccacchādakamohe, vināsite pekkhate hi gotrabhu amataṃ.
atk-s0517a:161_0: Vātā viya te candaṃ, amataṃ na hi pekkharenulomāni;
atk-s0517a:162_0: Puriso abbhāni yathā, gotrabhu na tamaṃ vinodeti.
atk-s0517a:170_0: Aññe ca anekasate, ānīsaṃse dadāti ñāṇamidanti.
atk-s0517a:171_1: Payogappaṭippassaddhipaññā phale ñāṇanti ettha payogoti bhuso yogo,
atk-s0517a:171_3: tassa payogassa paṭippassambhanaṃ niṭṭhānaṃ payogapaṭippassaddhi. Kiṃ taṃ?
atk-s0517a:171_5: Tassā payogapaṭippassaddhiyā hetubhūtāya pavattā phale paññā payogappaṭippassaddhipaññā.
atk-s0517a:171_8: Ekekassa hi maggañāṇassa anantarā tassa tasseva vipākabhūtāni nibbānārammaṇāni tīṇi vā dve vā ekaṃ vā phalacittāni uppajjanti.
atk-s0517a:171_10: “dandhaṃ ānantarikaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti ca ādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:171_24: Kālantaraphalaṃ pana samāpattivasena uppajjamānaṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa uppajjamānañca eteneva saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:172_1: Chinnavaṭumānupassane paññāti tena tena ariyamaggena samucchinnaṃ taṃ taṃ upakkilesaṃ pacchā passane paññā.
atk-s0517a:172_3: Vimuttīti ca upakkilesehi vimuttaṃ parisuddhaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0517a:172_6: Kilesehi vimuttaṃ cittasantatimpi kilesehi vimuttabhāvampi paccavekkhanto kilesehi na vinā paccavekkhatīti
atk-s0517a:172_8: “Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti hi idameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:172_9: Avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ pana avuttampi imināva vuttaṃ hotīti gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:174_0: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, iti vutto lakkhaṇo hāro”ti. ;
atk-s0517a:175_0: Atha vā arahato avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇābhāvā catunnaṃ ariyānaṃ labbhamānaṃ pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:176_1: Tadā samudāgate dhamme passane paññāti tadā maggakkhaṇe phalakkhaṇe ca samudāgate paṭilābhavasena ca
atk-s0517a:176_2: paṭivedhavasena ca samāgate sampatte samaṅgibhūte maggaphaladhamme catusaccadhamme ca passanā pekkhaṇā
atk-s0517a:176_4: Paccavekkhaṇe ñāṇanti nivattitvā bhusaṃ passanaṃ jānanaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:176_5: Iminā ca ñāṇadvayena paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni vuttāni honti.
atk-s0517a:176_6: Sotāpannassa hi maggavīthiyaṃ sotāpattiphalapariyosāne cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati,
atk-s0517a:176_7: tato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā maggapaccavekkhaṇatthāya manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:176_9: Puna bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā teneva nayena phalādīnaṃ paccavekkhaṇatthāya āvajjanādīni uppajjanti.
atk-s0517a:176_15: So hi “iminā vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti maggaṃ paccavekkhati,
atk-s0517a:176_16: tato “ayaṃ me ānisaṃso laddho”ti phalaṃ paccavekkhati,
atk-s0517a:176_17: tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati,
atk-s0517a:176_18: tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati,
atk-s0517a:176_19: avasāne “ayaṃ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭiladdho”ti amataṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati.
atk-s0517a:176_20: Iti sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa pañca paccavekkhaṇāni honti.
atk-s0517a:176_23: Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ nāma natthīti cattāriyeva paccavekkhaṇāni.
atk-s0517a:176_26: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ sekkhānaṃ hoti vā na vā.
atk-s0517a:176_27: Tassa hi abhāvatoyeva mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ pucchi “kosu nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno,
atk-s0517a:176_28: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:177_0: Ettha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇādīnaṃ ekādasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vibhāvanatthāya ayaṃ upamā veditabbā –
atk-s0517a:177_1: yathā puriso “macche gahessāmī”ti macchakhippaṃ gahetvā tadanurūpe udake osāretvā khippamukhena hatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:177_2: otāretvā antoudake kaṇhasappaṃ macchasaññāya gīvāya daḷhaṃ gahetvā “mahā vata mayā maccho laddho”ti tuṭṭho
atk-s0517a:177_3: ukkhipitvā passanto sovatthikattayadassanena “sappo”ti sañjānitvā bhīto ādīnavaṃ disvā gahaṇe nibbinno
atk-s0517a:177_4: muñcitukāmo hutvā muñcanassa upāyaṃ karonto agganaṅguṭṭhato paṭṭhāya hatthaṃ nibbeṭhetvā bāhaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0517a:177_5: uparisīse dve tayo vāre paribbhametvā sappaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā “gaccha re duṭṭhasappā”ti nissajjitvā vegena
atk-s0517a:177_6: thalaṃ āruyha ṭhitova “mahantassa vata bho sappassa mukhato muttomhī”ti haṭṭho āgatamaggaṃ olokeyya.
atk-s0517a:178_0: Tattha tassa purisassa macchasaññāya kaṇhasappaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā tussanaṃ viya imassa yogino ādito bālaputhujjanassa
atk-s0517a:178_1: aniccatādivasena bhayānakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ niccādisaññāya “ahaṃ mamā”ti diṭṭhitaṇhāhi daḷhaṃ gahetvā tussanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:178_2: tassa khippamukhato sappaṃ nīharitvā sovatthikattayaṃ disvā “sappo”ti sañjānanaṃ viya sappaccayanāmarūpapariggahena
atk-s0517a:178_3: ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā kalāpasammasanādīhi ñāṇehi khandhapañcakassa aniccatādilakkhaṇattayaṃ disvā “aniccaṃ
atk-s0517a:178_10: sappaṃ paribbhametvā dubbalaṃ katvā nivattitvā ḍaṃsituṃ asamatthabhāvapāpanaṃ viya tilakkhaṇāropanena
atk-s0517a:178_11: saṅkhārupekkhānulomañāṇehi saṅkhāre paribbhametvā dubbalaṃ katvā puna niccasukhattākārena upaṭṭhātuṃ
atk-s0517a:178_14: sappaṃ vissajjetvā thalaṃ āruyha ṭhānaṃ viya nibbānathalaṃ āruyha ṭhitaṃ maggaphalañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:179_0: Imesañca sutamayañāṇādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ uppattikkamena paṭipattikkamena ca desanakkamassa katattā
atk-s0517a:180_0: “Lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya,
atk-s0517a:180_3: rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjānaṃ anavasesappahānāyā”ti ca kilesappahānaṃyeva adhikaṃ katvā maggapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0517a:180_6: So pana kamo pañcavidho uppattikkamo pahānakkamo paṭipattikkamo bhūmikkamo desanakkamoti.
atk-s0517a:182_0: Abbudā jāyate pesi, pesi nibbattatī ghano”ti. –
atk-s0517a:183_8: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti vā,
atk-s0517a:183_11: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesī”ti vā evamādi desanakkamo.
atk-s0517a:183_12: Idha pana cuddasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ uppattikkamo paṭipattikkamo ca tadubhayavasena paṭipāṭiyā desitattā desanakkamo cāti tayo kamā veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:184_1: Idāni yasmā heṭṭhā sarūpena nāmarūpavavatthānañāṇaṃ na vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:184_2: tasmā pañcadhā nāmarūpappabhedaṃ dassetuṃ ajjhattavavatthāne paññā vatthunānatte ñāṇantiādīni pañca ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:184_3: Sakale hi nāmarūpe vutte yaṃ pariggahetuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0517a:184_8: Tattha ajjhattavavatthāneti “evaṃ pavattamānā mayaṃ attāti gahaṇaṃ gamissāmā”ti iminā viya adhippāyena attānaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā pavattāti ajjhattā.
atk-s0517a:184_9: Ajjhattasaddo panāyaṃ gocarajjhatte niyakajjhatte ajjhattajjhatte visayajjhatteti catūsu atthesu dissati. “Tena, ānanda,
atk-s0517a:184_10: bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:184_11: ajjhattarato samāhito”tiādīsu hi ayaṃ gocarajjhatte dissati.
atk-s0517a:184_13: ajjhattaṃ vā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī”tiādīsu niyakajjhatte.
atk-s0517a:184_18: vihāro tathāgatena abhisambuddho yadidaṃ sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu visayajjhatte,
atk-s0517a:184_25: Ettha javanamanoviññāṇassa paccayabhūto bhavaṅgamanopi cakkhādipañcakaṃ viya uppattiṭṭhānattā vatthūti vutto.
atk-s0517a:186_0: Bahiddhāti chahi ajjhattajjhattehi bahibhūtesu tesaṃ visayesu. Gocaranānatteti visayanānatte.
atk-s0517a:188_1: Catudhammavavatthāneti kāmāvacarabhūmiādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena catunnaṃ catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ vavatthāne.
atk-s0517a:189_1: Navadhammavavatthāneti kāmāvacarakusalādivasena pāmojjamūlakavasena yoniso manasikāramūlakavasena ca navannaṃ navannaṃ dhammānaṃ vavatthāne.
atk-s0517a:189_2: Imesu ca pañcasu ñāṇesu paṭhamaṃ ajjhattadhammā vavatthāpetabbāti vatthunānatte ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:189_3: tato tesaṃ visayā vavatthāpetabbāti tadanantaraṃ gocaranānatte ñāṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:189_4: tato parāni tīṇi ñāṇāni tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ navannaṃ vasena gaṇanānulomena vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:190_1: Idāni yasmā nāmarūpasseva pabhedato vavatthāpanañāṇaṃ ñātapariññā,
atk-s0517a:190_5: tasmā dhammanānattañāṇānantaraṃ ñātaṭṭhe ñāṇādīni pañca ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:190_6: Tisso hi pariññā ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññā ca.
atk-s0517a:190_8: vedayitalakkhaṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena pavattā paññā ñātapariññā nāma.
atk-s0517a:190_10: vedanā aniccā dukkhā anattā”tiādinā nayena tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāpaññā tīraṇapariññā nāma.
atk-s0517a:190_11: Tesuyeva pana dhammesu niccasaññādipajahanavasena pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāva pahānapariññā nāma.
atk-s0517a:191_0: Tattha saṅkhāraparicchedato paṭṭhāya yāva paccayapariggahā ñātapariññāya bhūmi.
atk-s0517a:191_1: Etasmiñhi antare dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:191_2: Kalāpasammasanato paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayānupassanā tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi.
atk-s0517a:191_4: Bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmi.
atk-s0517a:191_5: Tato paṭṭhāya hi “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0517a:191_11: paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahatī”ti evaṃ niccasaññādipahānasādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:192_1: Sā hi sobhanaṭṭhena abhisaddena “tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvajānanavasena sobhanaṃ jānana”nti katvā abhiññāti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:193_2: Sā hi byāpanaṭṭhena parisaddena “aniccādisāmaññalakkhaṇavasena sakiccasamāpanavasena vā byāpitaṃ jānana”nti katvā pariññāti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:197_2: tasmā tadanantaraṃ ariyapuggalānaṃyeva labbhamānāni cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:197_3: Tatthāpi paccayuppanno attho dukkhasaccaṃ viya pākaṭo suviññeyyo cāti paṭhamaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:197_6: tesu tīsupi ñāṇesu pavattanato tadanantaraṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ. Pa-
atk-s0517a:198_1: Ito parāni vihāraṭṭhe ñāṇādīni tīṇi ñāṇāni ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato paṭisambhidāpabhedato ca paṭisambhidāñāṇānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:199_1: Tato vihārasamāpattiñāṇasādhakassa “dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā”ti pubbe vuttassāpi maggañāṇassa
atk-s0517a:199_2: āsavasamucchedasamatthataṃ anantaraphaladāyakattañca kāraṇena visesetvā aparenākārena vattukāmena tadeva
atk-s0517a:199_4: Tattha avikkhepaparisuddhattāti vikkhipati tena cittanti vikkhepo,
atk-s0517a:199_16: okāsato yāva bhavaggaṃ savantīti vā āsavā,
atk-s0517a:199_17: etaṃ dhammaṃ etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0517a:201_0: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā,
atk-s0517a:201_2: Paññāti kāmāsavādīnaṃ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ samucchede paññā.
atk-s0517a:202_0: Ānantarikasamādhimhi ñāṇanti attano pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phalappadānato ānantarikoti laddhanāmo maggasamādhi.
atk-s0517a:202_1: Na hi maggasamādhimhi uppanne tassa phaluppattinisedhako koci antarāyo atthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0517a:205_1: Iminā maggañāṇena phalappattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato imassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ araṇavihārañāṇādīni cattāri ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:205_2: Tatrāpi ca arahatoyeva satatameva ca sambhavato araṇavihāre ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:205_3: tadanantaraṃ nirodhassa anāgāmiarahantānaṃ sambhavepi bahusambhārattā visesena ca nirodhassa nibbānasammatattā ca nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:205_4: tadanantaraṃ parinibbānassa kālantare parinibbānakālaṃ āhacca ṭhitattā dīghakālikanti parinibbāne ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:205_5: tadanantaraṃ samasīsaṭṭhassa sabbakilesakhayānantaraṃ parinibbānakālaṃ āhacca ṭhitattā rassakālikanti samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:205_7: kāro dassanādhipateyyañca santo vihārādhigamo ca paṇītādhimuttatā cāti tīhipi padehi sambandhitabbo.
atk-s0517a:206_1: Rāgādayo hi raṇanti satte cuṇṇenti pīḷentīti raṇā,
atk-s0517a:206_2: raṇanti etehi sattā kandanti paridevantīti vā raṇā.
atk-s0517a:206_7: Niddesavāre vuttapaṭhamajjhānādīni ca paṇītādhimuttatāya eva saṅgahitāni.
atk-s0517a:206_8: Phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitukāmatāya hi paṭhamajjhānādiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttadhamme vipassati,
atk-s0517a:206_9: yā ca araṇavibhaṅgasuttante bhagavatā desitā araṇapaṭipadā,
atk-s0517a:207_3: na kāmasukhaṃ anuyuñjeyya hīnaṃ gammaṃ pothujjanikaṃ anariyaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-s0517a:207_4: na ca attakilamathānuyogaṃ anuyuñjeyya dukkhaṃ anariyaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ. Ete kho,
atk-s0517a:207_6: ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0517a:207_9: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā nevussādeyya na apasādeyya,
atk-s0517a:207_22: adukkho eso dhammo avighāto anupāyāso apariḷāho sammāpaṭipadā.
atk-s0517a:207_25: yo attakilamathānuyogaṃ ananuyogo dukkhaṃ anariyaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:207_33: yāyaṃ nevussādanā na apasādanā dhammadesanā ca,
atk-s0517a:207_45: yvāyaṃ sammukhā khīṇavādo bhūto taccho atthasaṃhito,
atk-s0517a:207_53: yvāyaṃ janapadaniruttiyā ca anabhiniveso samaññāya ca anatisāro,
atk-s0517a:207_60: Saraṇañca dhammaṃ ñatvā araṇañca dhammaṃ ñatvā araṇaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjissāmāti evañhi vo,
atk-s0517a:208_0: Tattha majjhimā paṭipadā dassanādhipateyyena ca santena vihārādhigamena ca saṅgahitā.
atk-s0517a:208_1: Kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathaṃ ananuyogo majjhimā paṭipadā eva.
atk-s0517a:208_4: Sesā pana paṇītādhimuttatāya eva saṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:208_6: aññe arahanto dhammaṃ desentā “sammāpaṭipanne sammāpaṭipannā”ti “micchāpaṭipanne micchāpaṭipannā”ti puggalavasenāpi
atk-s0517a:208_10: Teneva bhagavā taṃyeva araṇapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannoti ca vaṇṇesi,
atk-s0517a:208_13: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti ca araṇavihārīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0517a:209_18: Evaṃvidhā paññā vasibhāvatāya paññāti vā attho. Si-
atk-s0517a:209_20: Samannāgatattā ca paṭippassaddhiyā ca ñāṇacariyāhi ca samādhicariyāhi cāti ca-
atk-s0517a:210_5: Samāpajjantena samāpajjīyati nāmāti samāpattīti ca vuccati.
atk-s0517a:211_6: Tassa pavattassa pariyādānaṃ parikkhayo appavatti pavattapariyādānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:211_8: Parinibbāne ñāṇanti arahato kāmacchandādīnaṃ parinibbānaṃ appavattaṃ anupādisesaparinibbānañca paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0517a:211_9: tasmiṃ kilesaparinibbāne khandhaparinibbāne ca pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:212_3: Nirodhe ca anupaṭṭhānatāti nirodhe gate puna na upaṭṭhānatāya,
atk-s0517a:212_5: Sammāsamucchede ca nirodhe ca anupaṭṭhānatā cāti ca-
atk-s0517a:213_3: yathāyogaṃ padhānattā ca koṭittā ca sīsāni.
atk-s0517a:213_4: Ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe vā ekasmiṃ roge vā sabhāgasantativasena ekasmiṃ jīvitindriye vā nekkhammādīni samāni
atk-s0517a:213_5: ca saddhādīni sīsāni ca assa santīti samasīsī,
atk-s0517a:213_9: Ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe roge vā sabhāgasantativasena jīvite vā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā tasmiṃyeva iriyāpathe
atk-s0517a:213_10: roge sabhāgajīvite vā cattāri maggaphalāni patvā,
atk-s0517a:213_11: tasmiṃyeva parinibbāyantassa arahatoyeva samasīsibhāvo hotīti tasmiṃ samasīsibhāve ñāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:214_1: Yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca.
atk-s0517a:215_4: Ayanti ayaṃ puggalo samasīsī nāma vuccati.
atk-s0517a:215_5: So panesa tividho hoti iriyāpathasamasīsī rogasamasīsī jīvitasamasīsīti.
atk-s0517a:215_6: Tattha yo caṅkamantova vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā caṅkamantova parinibbāti,
atk-s0517a:215_7: yo ṭhitakova vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā ṭhitakova parinibbāti,
atk-s0517a:215_8: yo nisinnova vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā nisinnova parinibbāti,
atk-s0517a:215_9: yo nipannova vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā nipannova parinibbāti,
atk-s0517a:215_11: Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antorogeyeva vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāti,
atk-s0517a:215_17: avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0517a:215_18: jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0517a:215_21: Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0517a:215_29: arahattamagge cattārīti ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyati.
atk-s0517a:215_30: Imāya vārasamatāya eva ubhayasīsapariyādānampi samaṃ hoti nāma.
atk-s0517a:216_1: Idāni yasmā sutamayasīlamayabhāvanāmayañāṇāni vaṭṭapādakāni sallekhā nāma na honti,
atk-s0517a:216_2: lokuttarapādakāneva etāni ca aññāni ca ñāṇāni sallekhāti vuccanti,
atk-s0517a:216_3: tasmā paccanīkasallekhanākārena pavattāni ñāṇāni dassetuṃ samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇānantaraṃ sallekhaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:216_4: Tattha puthunānattatejapariyādāne paññāti lokuttarehi asammissaṭṭhena puthūnaṃ rāgādīnañca nānattānaṃ
atk-s0517a:216_5: nānāsabhāvānaṃ kāmacchandādīnañca santāpanaṭṭhena “tejā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ dussīlyādīnañca pariyādāne khepane paññā,
atk-s0517a:216_6: nekkhammādimhi sattatiṃsabhede dhamme paññāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:216_7: Atha vā puthubhūtā nānattabhūtā ca tejā eva tesaṃ puthubhūtānaṃ nānattabhūtānaṃ dussīlyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ tejānaṃ pariyādāne paññāti attho.
atk-s0517a:216_8: Tejehiyeva puthūnaṃ nānattānañca saṅgahaṃ niddesavāre pakāsayissāma.
atk-s0517a:217_0: Sallekhaṭṭhe ñāṇanti paccanīkadhamme sallekhati samucchindatīti sallekho,
atk-s0517a:217_3: mayamettha avihiṃsakā bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā sallekhasuttante vutto
atk-s0517a:218_1: Idāni sallekhe ṭhitena kattabbaṃ sammappadhānavīriyaṃ dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:218_2: Tattha asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭheti kosajjavasena asallīno asaṅkucito attā assāti asallīnatto.
atk-s0517a:220_0: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā”ti. ādi –
atk-s0517a:221_0: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahito pesito vissaṭṭho attā etenāti pahitatto.
atk-s0517a:221_2: “yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:221_3: Asallīnatto ca so pahitatto cāti asallīnattapahitatto.
atk-s0517a:221_12: Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
atk-s0517a:221_14: Yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:221_15: na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti vuttattā asallīnattapahitattavacanena padhānasmiṃ appaṭivānitā anivattanatā vuttā.
atk-s0517a:221_16: Paggahaṭṭhavacanena pana kosajjuddhaccavimuttaṃ samappavattaṃ vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:222_2: vidhinā vā nayena upāyena īrayitabbaṃ pavattayitabbanti vīriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:222_8: Sammā āraddhaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:222_11: Ayañhi ārambhasaddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kiriyāyaṃ vīriye hiṃsāyaṃ vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
atk-s0517a:225_1: “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
atk-s0517a:225_3: na te honti mahapphalā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikiriyā.
atk-s0517a:225_6: “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārambhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā.
atk-s0517a:226_1: Idāni sammāvāyāmasiddhaṃ maggaphalaṃ pattena lokahitatthaṃ dhammadesanā kātabbāti dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ atthasandassane ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:226_2: Tattha nānādhammappakāsanatāti sabbasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatavasena nānādhammānaṃ pakāsanatā dīpanatā desanatā.
atk-s0517a:226_5: Dhammā ca atthā ca te eva.
atk-s0517a:227_1: Idāni paresaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassentassa tassa ariyapuggalassa yathāsabhāvadhammadesanākāraṇaṃ dassanavisuddhiṃ
atk-s0517a:227_3: Tattha sabbadhammānaṃ ekasaṅgahatā nānattekattapaṭivedheti sabbesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ ekasaṅgahatāya
atk-s0517a:227_4: ca kāmacchandādīnaṃ nānattassa ca nekkhammādīnaṃ ekattassa ca paṭivedho,
atk-s0517a:227_21: ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ jātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0517a:227_22: “Ekajātikā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe jātiyā ekasaṅgahitā.
atk-s0517a:227_30: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ sañjātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0517a:227_31: “Ekaṭṭhāne jātā saṃvaḍḍhā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe jātiṭṭhānena nivutthokāsena ekasaṅgahitā.
atk-s0517a:227_38: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ kiriyāsaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0517a:227_39: Sabbeva hi te attano kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahitā.
atk-s0517a:227_43: tena vata re vattabbe cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita”nti ayaṃ gaṇanasaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0517a:227_45: Tathaṭṭhādīsu dvādasasu ākāresu visuṃ visuṃ ekena saṅgaho gaṇanaparicchedo etesanti ekasaṅgahā,
atk-s0517a:229_1: Idāni dassanavisuddhisādhakāni vipassanāñāṇāni dvidhā dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ khantiñāṇapariyogāhaṇañāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:229_2: Tattha viditattā paññāti rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ aniccādito viditattā pavattā paññā.
atk-s0517a:230_1: Phuṭṭhattā paññāti rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ aniccādivasena ñāṇaphassena phuṭṭhattā pavattā paññā.
atk-s0517a:230_2: Pariyogāhaṇe ñāṇanti phuṭṭhameva pariyogāhati pavisatīti pariyogāhaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Gā-
atk-s0517a:230_7: Evaṃ sante etāni dve ñāṇāni ekassa na sambhavanti,
atk-s0517a:230_8: tadasambhave ekassa sāvakassa sattasaṭṭhi sāvakasādhāraṇañāṇāni na sambhavanti,
atk-s0517a:231_1: Idāni yasmā puthujjanā sekkhā ca vipassanūpage khandhādayo dhamme sakale eva sammasanti,
atk-s0517a:231_4: arahatoyeva yathāruci padesavihāro labbhatīti dassanavisuddhisādhakāni ñāṇāni vatvā tadanantaraṃ arahato
atk-s0517a:231_6: Tattha samodahane paññāti khandhādīnaṃ ekadesassa vedanādhammassa samodahanapaññā,
atk-s0517a:232_0: Padesavihāre ñāṇanti khandhādīnaṃ padesena ekadesena avayavena vihāro padesavihāro,
atk-s0517a:232_3: Evaṃ nānāvidho cesa vedanā eva. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0517a:232_13: kusalādīnaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ vedanāvasena dhammekadesoti evaṃ vedanā eva khandhādīnaṃ padeso,
atk-s0517a:233_1: Idāni yasmā samādhibhāvanāmayañāṇādīni bhāventā puthujjanā sekkhā ca te te bhāvetabbabhāvanādhamme adhipatī
atk-s0517a:233_2: jeṭṭhake katvā tena tena pahātabbe tappaccanīke nānāsabhāve dhamme anekādīnave ādīnavato paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0517a:233_3: tassa tassa bhāvanādhammassa vasena cittaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā te te paccanīkadhamme pajahanti.
atk-s0517a:233_4: Pajahantā vipassanākāle sabbasaṅkhāre suññato disvā pacchā samucchedena pajahanti,
atk-s0517a:233_5: tathā pajahantā ca ekābhisamayavasena saccāni paṭivijjhantā pajahanti.
atk-s0517a:233_6: Yathāvutteheva ākārehi sabbepi ariyā yathāyogaṃ paṭipajjanti,
atk-s0517a:233_7: tasmā padesavihārañāṇānantaraṃ saññāvivaṭṭañāṇādīni cha ñāṇāni yathākkamena uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:233_8: Tattha adhipatattā paññāti nekkhammādīnaṃ adhipatibhāvena nekkhammādīni adhikāni katvā tadadhikabhāvena pavattā paññāti attho.
atk-s0517a:233_9: Saññāvivaṭṭe ñāṇanti saññāya vivaṭṭanaṃ parāvaṭṭanaṃ parammukhabhāvoti saññāvivaṭṭo,
atk-s0517a:233_10: yāya saññāya te te bhāvanādhamme adhipatiṃ karoti,
atk-s0517a:233_12: karaṇabhūtāya vā tato tato kāmacchandādito vivaṭṭane ñāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:233_14: tato eva vivaṭṭoti gayhati yathā vivaṭṭanānupassanāya.
atk-s0517a:233_16: tadevetanti puna sañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā dāruādīsu tacchakādayo viya,
atk-s0517a:233_18: ārammaṇe anogāḷhavuttitāya aciraṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānā vā vijju viya,
atk-s0517a:233_19: yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ purisāti uppannasaññā viya.
atk-s0517a:234_1: Nānatte paññāti nānāsabhāve bhāvetabbato aññasabhāve kāmacchandādike ādīnavadassanena pavattā paññā.
atk-s0517a:234_5: Cetovivaṭṭe ñāṇanti cetaso kāmacchandādito vivaṭṭanaṃ nekkhammādīsu ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:234_11: Accāyikakammānussaraṇādīsu ca panāyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ ussāhanabhāvena pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0517a:235_1: Adhiṭṭhāne paññāti nekkhammādivasena cittassa patiṭṭhāpane paññā.
atk-s0517a:235_2: Cittavivaṭṭe ñāṇanti kāmacchandādipahānavasena cittassa vivaṭṭane ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:236_1: Suññate paññāti attattaniyasuññatāya anattānattaniye pavattā anattānupassanā paññā.
atk-s0517a:236_2: Ñāṇavivaṭṭe ñāṇanti ñāṇameva abhinivesato vivaṭṭatīti vivaṭṭo,
atk-s0517a:238_1: Tathaṭṭhe paññāti ekekassa saccassa catubbidhe catubbidhe aviparītasabhāve kiccavasena asammohato pavattā paññā.
atk-s0517a:238_2: Saccavivaṭṭe ñāṇanti catūsu saccesu dubhato vuṭṭhānavasena vivaṭṭatīti saccavivaṭṭo,
atk-s0517a:239_1: Idāni tassa saccavivaṭṭañāṇavasena pavattassa āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇassa vasena pavattāni kamato cha abhiññāñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:239_2: Tatthāpi lokapākaṭānubhāvattā ativimhāpananti paṭhamaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:239_3: cetopariyañāṇassa visayato dibbasotañāṇaṃ oḷārikavisayanti dutiyaṃ dibbasotañāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:239_5: Tīsu vijjāsu pubbenivāsacchādakātītatamavinodakattā paṭhamaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:239_7: sabbatamasamucchedakattā tatiyaṃ āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:239_10: Ekavavatthānatāti parikammacittena ekato ṭhapanatāya ca dissamānakāyena,
atk-s0517a:239_11: adissamānakāyena vā gantukāmakāle yathāyogaṃ kāyassapi cittassapi missīkaraṇatāya cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:239_13: Sarīrañhi asucisañcayato kucchitānaṃ kesādīnañceva cakkhurogādīnaṃ rogasatānañca āyabhūtato kāyoti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:239_14: Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañcāti ettha catutthajjhānasampayuttaṃ ekaṃyeva saññaṃ ākāranānattato dvidhā katvā samuccayattho ca-
atk-s0517a:239_18: Sāyeva nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādipaccanīkehi ca vimuttattā lahusaññā.
atk-s0517a:239_23: Ettāvatā sabbappakārassa iddhividhassa yathāyogaṃ kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:240_21: ijjhantīti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:241_1: Vitakkavipphāravasenāti dibbasotadhātuuppādanatthaṃ parikammakaraṇakāle saddanimittesu attano vitakkavipphāravasena vitakkavegavasena.
atk-s0517a:241_7: Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:241_9: tajjāsamannāhārena pana indriyena ca parikkhitte visaye anantarāyena uppajjanato āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhānoti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:241_11: Saddā eva cettha vitakkuppattikāraṇattā saṅkhāranimittattā ca nimittāni.
atk-s0517a:241_23: Sotadhātuvisuddhiñāṇanti savanaṭṭhena ca nijjīvaṭṭhena ca sotadhātu,
atk-s0517a:242_4: cetopariyañāṇuppādanatthaṃ parikammakaraṇakāle paresaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ cittānaṃ vipphārahetunā.
atk-s0517a:242_5: Indriyānaṃ pasādavasenāti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ pasādavasena,
atk-s0517a:242_6: indriyānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsā cettha phalūpacārena indriyānanti vuttā yathā “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso,
atk-s0517a:242_11: Atha vā idamappasannanti gahaṇassa pasādamapekkhitvā eva sambhavato “pasādavasenā”ti vacaneneva appasādopi vuttova hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:243_1: Paccayappavattānaṃ dhammānanti paṭiccasamuppādavasena paccayato pavattānaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:243_6: Nānattekattakammavipphāravasena paccayapavattānaṃ dhammānaṃ pariyogāhaṇe paññāti sambandho.
atk-s0517a:243_8: Nivutthāti ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā.
atk-s0517a:243_10: Nivutthāti gocaranivāsena nivutthā attano viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnā,
atk-s0517a:244_1: Obhāsavasenāti dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthaṃ pasāritassa tejokasiṇaodātakasiṇaālokakasiṇānaṃ aññatarassa
atk-s0517a:245_1: Devānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:245_3: Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:246_1: Catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehīti aṭṭhasu maggaphalesu ekekasmiṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehi.
atk-s0517a:246_5: arahattaphale aṭṭhannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena aṭṭhahi ākārehi aññātāvindriyasseva vasibhāvatāya arahattamaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0517a:246_7: Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇanti attanā vajjhānaṃ āsavānaṃ khayakaraṃ arahattamaggañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:247_1: Idāni āsavānaṃ khayañāṇasaṅkhātaarahattamaggañāṇasambandhe catunnampi maggañāṇānaṃ ekekassa maggañāṇassa
atk-s0517a:247_2: ekābhisamayataṃ dassetuṃ “pariññaṭṭhe paññā”tiādīni cattāri ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:247_3: Tatthāpi oḷārikattā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:247_7: Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṃ vā sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dukkhamāha,
atk-s0517a:247_10: ito pana hotīti ñāpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayasaccaṃ,
atk-s0517a:247_11: tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṃviggamānasānaṃ dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṃ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:247_13: Idāni tabbisayāni ñāṇāni teneva kamena uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:247_14: Tattha pariññaṭṭheti dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhādike catubbidhe parijānitabbasabhāve.
atk-s0517a:248_1: Idāni bhāvitamaggassa paccavekkhaṇavasena vā abhāvitamaggassa anussavavasena vā visuṃ visuṃ saccañāṇāni
atk-s0517a:248_2: dassetuṃ dukkhe ñāṇādīni cattāri ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:249_1: iti ayaṃ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu viya saṃyogaṃ dīpeti. U-
atk-s0517a:249_2: iti ayaṃ saddo “uppannaṃ udita”ntiādīsu viya uppattiṃ. Aya-
atk-s0517a:249_4: Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṃ avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati dukkhassa uppattikāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:250_3: Tasmā abhāvo ettha saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā,
atk-s0517a:250_4: samadhigate vā tasmiṃ saṃsāracārakassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi “dukkhanirodha”nti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:251_0: Dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyāti ettha yasmā ayaṃ etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tadabhimukhībhūtattā,
atk-s0517a:251_3: Cattāri maggañāṇāneva heṭṭhā vuṭṭhānākāradīpanavasena “magge ñāṇa”nti vuttāni,
atk-s0517a:251_7: tassa ca ñāṇassa abhiññābhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ arahattamaggañāṇameva “āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:251_8: Puna catunnampi maggañāṇānaṃ ekābhisamayataṃ dīpetuṃ “pariññaṭṭhe paññā dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri ñāṇāni vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:251_9: Puna ekekasmiṃ sacce visuṃ visuṃ uppattidīpanavasena “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhānīti evaṃ pubbāparaviseso veditabboti.
atk-s0517a:252_1: Idāni sabbesaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ ariyamaggānubhāveneva paṭisambhidāñāṇāni siddhānīti dassetuṃ atthapaṭisambhide
atk-s0517a:252_4: heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhāni pana pabhinnapaṭisambhidānaṃ pabhedappattāni paṭisambhidāñāṇānīti veditabbānīti ayametesaṃ ubhayatthavacane viseso.
atk-s0517a:252_5: Yasmā vā anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ dukkhārammaṇaṃ nirodhārammaṇañca ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā hoti,
atk-s0517a:252_9: tasmā tampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ suddhikapaṭisambhidāñāṇāni uddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0517a:252_10: Tasmāyeva ca heṭṭhā nānattasaddena visesetvā vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:253_1: Evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā sattasaṭṭhi sāvakasādhāraṇañāṇāni uddisitvā idāni sāvakehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatānaṃyeva
atk-s0517a:253_2: āveṇikāni ñāṇāni dassetuṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇādīni cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:253_3: Tatthapi yasmā tathāgatā sattānaṃ dhammadesanāya bhājanābhājanattaṃ olokentā buddhacakkhunā olokenti.
atk-s0517a:254_0: “Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:255_0: Sattasantāne ca olokentā paṭhamaṃ indriyaparipākāparipākaṃ olokenti,
atk-s0517a:255_1: indriyaparipākañca ñatvā āsayādīnaṃ anurūpena dhammadesanatthaṃ tato āsayānusayacaritāni olokenti,
atk-s0517a:255_4: Dhammaṃ desentā ca yasmā pāṭihāriyena vinetabbānaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karonti,
atk-s0517a:255_6: Imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ñāṇānaṃ hetuparidīpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ mahākaruṇāñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:256_0: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇanti ettha upari “sattāna”nti padaṃ idheva āharitvā “sattānaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇa”nti yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:256_1: Parāni ca aparāni ca parāparānīti vattabbe sandhivasena ro-
atk-s0517a:256_5: veneyyasattānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ,
atk-s0517a:256_12: Atha vā parāni ca oparāni ca paroparāni,
atk-s0517a:257_1: Sattānaṃ āsayānusaye ñāṇanti ettha rūpādīsu khandhesu chandarāgena sattā visattāti sattā.
atk-s0517a:258_1: yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā,
atk-s0517a:258_4: Vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā,
atk-s0517a:259_11: Jātiggahaṇena ca dvandasamāsavasena ca ekavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:259_13: tasmā uddese caritādhimuttīsu ñāṇāni āsayānusayañāṇeneva saṅgahetvā “āsayānusaye ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:260_1: Yamakapāṭihīre ñāṇanti ettha aggikkhandhaudakadhārādīnaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ sakiṃyeva pavattito yamakaṃ,
atk-s0517a:261_1: Mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā ñāṇanti ettha paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā,
atk-s0517a:261_2: kināti vā paradukkhaṃ hiṃsati vināsetīti karuṇā,
atk-s0517a:261_3: kirīyati vā dukkhitesu pharaṇavasena pasārīyatīti karuṇā,
atk-s0517a:261_4: pharaṇakammavasena kammaguṇavasena ca mahatī karuṇā mahākaruṇā,
atk-s0517a:261_6: mahākaruṇā ca sā samāpatti cāti mahākaruṇāsamāpatti.
atk-s0517a:262_1: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇanti ettha pañcaneyyapathappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ aññāsīti sabbaññū,
atk-s0517a:262_4: Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatādibhedā sabbadhammā hi saṅkhāro vikāro lakkhaṇaṃ nibbānaṃ paññattīti pañceva neyyapathā honti.
atk-s0517a:262_12: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārammaṇacittasambhavato bhavaṅgacittavirodhato yuttiabhāvato ca satatasabbaññutā na hoti,
atk-s0517a:262_15: Sattisabbaññuno sabbajānanattaṃ natthīti tampi na yujjati.
atk-s0517a:264_0: Sabbaṃ abhiññāsi yadatthi neyyaṃ, tathāgato tena samantacakkhū”ti. –
atk-s0517a:265_1: Evañhi sati kiccato asammohato kāraṇasiddhito āvajjanapaṭibaddhato sabbaññuttameva hotīti.
atk-s0517a:265_2: Āvajjanapaṭibaddhattā eva hi natthi etassa āvaraṇanti anāvaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:266_0: Imāni tesattati ñāṇānīti sāvakehi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena uddiṭṭhāni imāni tesattati ñāṇāni.
atk-s0517a:266_1: Imesaṃ tesattatiyā ñāṇānanti ādito paṭṭhāya vuttānaṃ imesaṃ tesattatiñāṇānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:266_6: Sāvakasādhāraṇānīti savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātattā sāvakā,
atk-s0517a:266_9: Cha ñāṇānīti ante uddiṭṭhāni cha ñāṇāni.
atk-s0517a:266_10: Asādhāraṇāni sāvakehīti sāvakehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatānaṃyeva ñāṇānīti.
atk-s0517a:271_1: Idāni yathānikkhittena uddesena saṅgahite dhamme pabhedato dassetuṃ kathaṃ sotāvadhāne paññā sutamaye ñāṇantiādi niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-s0517a:272_1: pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0517a:272_2: tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0517a:273_1: pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0517a:273_2: so aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0517a:274_1: pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhando hoti vimatipakkhando dveḷhakajāto “evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho,
atk-s0517a:275_4: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti? “Aniccaṃ, bhante”.
atk-s0517a:275_6: dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti? “Dukkhaṃ, bhante”.
atk-s0517a:277_0: Idāni samātikuddesāya kathetukamyatāpucchāya “ime dhammā abhiññeyyāti sotāvadhānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:277_1: taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇa”ntiādayo soḷasa vissajjanuddesā.
atk-s0517a:277_4: aññatarassa vā garuṭṭhāniyassa sabrahmacārissa dhammaṃ desayantassa pubbe vuttanayena sotāvadhānaṃ sutaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:277_5: Taṃpajānanā paññā tassa sutassa pajānanā pariyāyaparicchindakapaññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ nāmāti attho.
atk-s0517a:277_9: Pariññeyyāti sāmaññalakkhaṇāvabodhavasena kiccasamāpanavasena ca byāpitvā jānitabbā.
atk-s0517a:277_12: Duvidhā hi sacchikiriyā paṭilābhasacchikiriyā ārammaṇasacchikiriyā ca.
atk-s0517a:277_14: Tadanudhammatāya satiyā saṇṭhānavasena ṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhitiṃ bhajantīti ṭhitibhāgiyā.
atk-s0517a:277_16: Anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti ariyamaggo nibbedho nāma,
atk-s0517a:277_17: nibbidāsahagatānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ samudācāravasena taṃ nibbedhaṃ bhajantīti nibbedhabhāgiyā.
atk-s0517a:278_3: te eva paccayehi saṅgamma katattā saṅkhatāti visesetvā vuttā.
atk-s0517a:278_5: Tepi “aniccā va saṅkhārā”tiādīsu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:278_8: purisapuggalo puññañceva saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādīsu avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāva āgatā tebhūmikakusalākusalacetanā abhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhārā nāma.
atk-s0517a:278_10: tāvatikaṃ gantvā akkhāhataṃ maññe aṭṭhāsī”tiādīsu āgataṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ payogābhisaṅkhāro nāma.
atk-s0517a:278_18: Saññā ca vedanā ca cittena saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā.
atk-s0517a:279_4: Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccantiādīsu “dukkhasamudayo dukkhanirodho”ti vattabbe “dukkhasamudayaṃ dukkhanirodha”nti liṅgavipallāso kato.
atk-s0517a:279_22: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ariyoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0517a:279_33: titthiyānaṃ parikappitaattāva anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti,
atk-s0517a:279_34: atha kho bādhanapabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva.
atk-s0517a:279_35: Esa aggilakkhaṇaṃ viya lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:280_0: Nābādhakaṃ yato dukkhaṃ, dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakaṃ;
atk-s0517a:282_0: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
atk-s0517a:284_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṃ na ca na taṃ yato;
atk-s0517a:286_0: Maggā aññaṃ na niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
atk-s0517a:290_0: So panāyaṃ saccasaddo anekesu atthesu dissati.
atk-s0517a:290_7: yasmiṃ pajā no vivade pajāna”ntiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca.
atk-s0517a:290_8: “Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ kati kusalā kati akusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce.
atk-s0517a:294_1: Idāni vissajjanuddesasaṅgahite dhamme pabhedato dassetuṃ kathaṃ ime dhammā abhiññeyyātiādi niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-s0517a:294_2: Tattha abhiññeyyaniddesādīsu pañcasu ādito ekakādivasena dasa dasa vissajjanāni dasuttarapariyāyena saṃsandetvā uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:294_3: Tesu abhiññeyyaniddese tāva sabbe sattāti kāmabhavādīsu saññābhavādīsu ekavokārabhavādīsu ca sabbabhavesu sabbe sattā.
atk-s0517a:294_6: Iti sabbasattānaṃ ṭhitihetu āhāro nā eko dhammo adhikena ñāṇena jānitabbo.
atk-s0517a:294_7: Paccaye hi abhiññāte paccayuppannāpi abhiññātā honti ubhinnampi aññamaññāpekkhattā.
atk-s0517a:294_9: Nanu ca evaṃ sante yaṃ vuttaṃ “asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārā aphassakā”tiādi,
atk-s0517a:294_18: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā,
atk-s0517a:294_23: Etasmiñhi sutte nippariyāyena āhāralakkhaṇāva dhammā āhārāti vuttā.
atk-s0517a:294_24: Idha pana pariyāyena paccayo āhāroti vutto.
atk-s0517a:294_26: so ca yaṃ yaṃ phalaṃ janeti,
atk-s0517a:296_0: Etasmiñhi paccayāhāre gahite pariyāyāhāropi nippariyāyāhāropi sabbo gahitova hoti.
atk-s0517a:297_1: Anuppanne hi buddhe titthāyatane pabbajitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya “dhī cittaṃ,
atk-s0517a:297_5: citte asati nattheta”nti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃkatvā asaññabhave nibbattanti.
atk-s0517a:297_6: Yo yassa iriyāpatho manussaloke paṇihito ahosi,
atk-s0517a:297_7: so tena iriyāpathena nibbattitvā pañca kappasatāni tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0517a:297_8: Ettakaṃ addhānaṃ nipanno viya nisinno viya ṭhito viya hoti.
atk-s0517a:297_10: Te hi yaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetvā nibbattā,
atk-s0517a:297_12: Yathā jiyāvegena khittasaro yāva jiyāvego atthi,
atk-s0517a:297_16: Tasmiṃ niṭṭhite khīṇavego saro viya patanti.
atk-s0517a:298_0: Ye pana te nerayikā “nevuṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino na puññaphalūpajīvino”ti vuttā,
atk-s0517a:298_6: tasmā yena kammena te niraye nibbattā,
atk-s0517a:298_8: Yaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “na tāva kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0517a:298_9: yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantī hotī”ti.
atk-s0517a:298_11: Kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ ārabbhāti cettha vivādo na kātabbo.
atk-s0517a:298_12: Mukhe uppannakheḷopi hi tesaṃ āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0517a:298_13: Kheḷo hi niraye dukkhavedanīyo hutvā paccayo hoti,
atk-s0517a:298_17: asaññānañceva avasesānañca paccayāhāroti iminā āhārena sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā.
atk-s0517a:299_2: Bhagavatopi hi dhammapuggalānaṃ vasena catubbidhā desanā –
atk-s0517a:299_12: bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hotī”ti evarūpī dhammādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā.
atk-s0517a:299_15: anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya,
atk-s0517a:299_16: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti evarūpī dhammādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā.
atk-s0517a:299_19: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti,
atk-s0517a:299_22: pātubhāvā mahato cakkhussa pātubhāvo hotī”ti evarūpī puggalādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā.
atk-s0517a:299_24: Upari yāva dasakā dhammānaṃyeva gahitattā sattaggahaṇena dhammaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:299_25: visesena vā sattasantānapariyāpannadhammānaṃyeva adhikena ñāṇena sabhāvato upaparikkhitabbattā sattaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:299_26: saṅkhāre upādāya sattoti paññattimattasambhavato vā phalopacārena saṅkhārā “sattā”ti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:299_27: Na hi koci satto paccayaṭṭhitiko atthi aññatra saṅkhārehi,
atk-s0517a:300_0: Dve dhātuyoti saṅkhatā ca dhātu asaṅkhatā ca dhātu.
atk-s0517a:300_1: Tattha anekehi paccayehi saṅgamma katā pañcakkhandhā saṅkhatā dhātu,
