atk-s0517a:1250_26: sacchikiriyāpaññā phassanaṭṭhe ñāṇa”nti ekekameva ñāṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1252_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissatī”ti. –
atk-s0517a:1253_1: idha pana yathāvuttena atthena tesaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1253_2: Aṭṭhakathāyameva hi so lokiyañāṇavasena dhammābhisamayo vuttoti.
atk-s0517a:1254_0: Kāmacchando nānattanti vikkhepasabbhāvato nānārammaṇattā ca nānāsabhāvoti attho.
atk-s0517a:1254_2: Nekkhammaṃ ekattanti cittekaggatāsabbhāvato nānārammaṇavikkhepābhāvato ca ekasabhāvanti attho.
atk-s0517a:1254_4: Idha peyyālena saṃkhittānaṃ byāpādādīnaṃ akusalānaṃ yathāvuttena atthena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1254_5: Vitakkavicārādīnaṃ pana heṭṭhimānaṃ heṭṭhimānaṃ uparimato uparimato oḷārikaṭṭhena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1254_6: Yasmā ekasaṅgahitanānattekattānaṃ paṭivedho maggakkhaṇe saccapaṭivedhena sijjhati,
atk-s0517a:1255_5: Yathā nāvā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni karoti,
atk-s0517a:1255_10: evameva maggañāṇaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇe cattāri saccāni abhisameti,
atk-s0517a:1255_16: Nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena cattāripi saccāni pāpuṇāti passati paṭivijjhatīti.
atk-s0517a:1255_24: evaṃ pārimatīrabhūtaṃ nirodhaṃ sacchikarotīti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1256_0: Dassanaṃ visujjhatīti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesatamappahānena ñāṇadassanaṃ visuddhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0517a:1256_1: Dassanaṃ visuddhanti tassa tassa phalassa uppādakkhaṇe tassa tassa maggañāṇassa kiccasiddhippattito ñāṇadassanaṃ visuddhibhāvaṃ pattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1256_2: Sabbadhammānaṃ ekasaṅgahitāya nānattekattapaṭivedhapaññāya maggaphalañāṇehi siddhito ante maggaphalañāṇāni vuttāni.
atk-s0517a:1259_1: Khantiñāṇapariyogāhaṇañāṇaniddesesu rūpaṃ aniccato viditanti aniccānupassanāya aniccanti ñātaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1259_2: Rūpaṃ dukkhato viditanti dukkhānupassanāya dukkhanti ñātaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1259_3: Rūpaṃ anattato viditanti anattānupassanāya anattāti ñātaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1259_5: taṃ taṃ khamatīti yaṃ yaṃ rūpaṃ aniccādito viditaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1259_6: taṃ taṃ rūpaṃ aniccādito khamati ruccati.
atk-s0517a:1259_9: taṃ taṃ khamatī”ti visuṃ visuñca katvā kesuci potthakesu likhitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1259_10: “Vedanā saññā saṅkhārā aniccato viditā”tiādinā liṅgavacanāni parivattetvā yojetabbāni.
atk-s0517a:1262_1: Padesavihārañāṇaniddese yenākārena mātikāya uddiṭṭho padeso paccavekkhitabbo,
atk-s0517a:1262_3: Tattha micchādiṭṭhipaccayāti diṭṭhisampayuttavedanāpi vaṭṭati diṭṭhiṃ upanissayaṃ katvā uppannā kusalākusalavedanāpi vipākavedanāpi.
atk-s0517a:1262_5: diṭṭhiṃ pana upanissāya kusalāpi uppajjanti akusalāpi.
atk-s0517a:1262_6: Micchādiṭṭhikā hi diṭṭhiṃ upanissāya pakkhadivasesu yāgubhattādīni denti,
atk-s0517a:1262_14: Micchādiṭṭhiṃ pana nissāya sammādiṭṭhike akkosanti paribhāsanti vadhabandhādīni karonti,
atk-s0517a:1262_18: Sā pana micchādiṭṭhi sahajātāya vedanāya sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1262_19: samanantaraniruddhā micchādiṭṭhi paccuppannamicchādiṭṭhisampayuttāya vedanāya anantarasamanantarūpanissayaāsevananatthivigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1262_20: micchādiṭṭhiṃ garuṃ katvā abhinandantassa lobhasahagatavedanāya ārammaṇaārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayapaccayehi paccayo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1262_21: sabbākusalehi micchādiṭṭhiṃ ārammaṇamattaṃ karontassa sabbākusalavedanāya micchādiṭṭhiṃ paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0517a:1262_23: micchādiṭṭhipaccayena uppajjamānānaṃ kusalākusalavedanānaṃ bhavantare vipākavedanānañca upanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1263_3: Keci pana “micchādiṭṭhivūpasamo nāma vipassanākkhaṇe sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe cā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0517a:1264_0: Sammādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayitanti etthāpi sammādiṭṭhisampayuttavedanāpi vaṭṭati sammādiṭṭhiṃ upanissayaṃ
atk-s0517a:1264_3: sammādiṭṭhiṃ pana upanissāya buddhapūjā dīpamālāropanaṃ mahādhammassavanaṃ appatiṭṭhite disābhāge cetiyapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīni puññāni karonti.
atk-s0517a:1264_10: Sā pana sammādiṭṭhi sahajātāya samanantaraniruddhāya paccuppannāya vedanāya micchādiṭṭhiyā vuttapaccayeheva paccayo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1264_11: lokikasammādiṭṭhi paccavekkhaṇasampayuttāya vipassanāsampayuttāya nikantisampayuttāya ca vedanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1265_5: tassa tassa paṭipakkhadhammapaccayāva taṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1265_6: Micchāñāṇādīsu pana micchāñāṇaṃ nāma pāpakiriyāsu upāyacintā.
atk-s0517a:1265_8: Sammāñāṇaṃ nāma vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiṃ lokuttarasammādiṭṭhiñca ṭhapetvā avasesakusalābyākataṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1265_10: Atha vā ayāthāvavimutti aniyyānikavimutti avimuttasseva sato vimuttisaññīti.
atk-s0517a:1266_5: Saññāpaccayā ṭhapetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ sesā cha samāpattivedanā.
atk-s0517a:1267_0: Chando ca avūpasanto hotītiādīsu sace chandavitakkasaññā avūpasantā hontīti attho.
atk-s0517a:1267_1: Tappaccayāti so chandavitakkasaññānaṃ avūpasamo eva paccayo tappaccayo,
atk-s0517a:1267_6: Tappaccayāti so chandassa vūpasamo vitakkasaññānaṃ avūpasamo eva paccayo tappaccayo,
atk-s0517a:1267_10: Tappaccayāti so chandavitakkānaṃ vūpasamo saññāya avūpasamo eva paccayo tappaccayo,
atk-s0517a:1267_14: Tappaccayāti so chandavitakkasaññānaṃ vūpasamo eva paccayo tappaccayo,
atk-s0517a:1267_17: Keci pana “chando nāma appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti pubbabhāge dhammacchando,
atk-s0517a:1267_22: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa ca nirodhaṃ samāpannassa ca saññā vūpasantā hotī”ti evaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0517a:1267_27: Tasmimpi ṭhāne anuppatteti tassa vīriyārambhassa vasena tasmiṃ arahattaphalassa kāraṇe ariyamagge anuppatte.
atk-s0517a:1267_31: Tasmimpi ṭhāne anuppatteti tassā bhūmiyā pattiyā”ti vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0517a:1270_1: Vivaṭṭañāṇachakkaniddese nekkhammādhipatattā paññāti nekkhammaṃ adhikaṃ katvā nekkhammādhikabhāvena pavattā paññā.
atk-s0517a:1271_1: Kāmacchando nānattanti kāmacchando santavuttitāya abhāvato na ekasabhāvo.
atk-s0517a:1271_3: Nekkhammekattaṃ cetayatoti kāmacchande ādīnavadassanena nekkhammaṃ pavattayato.
atk-s0517a:1271_4: Kāmacchandato cittaṃ vivaṭṭatīti diṭṭhādīnavato kāmacchandato nekkhammakkhaṇe cittaṃ vivaṭṭati.
atk-s0517a:1272_1: Kāmacchandaṃ pajahantoti nekkhammapavattikkhaṇe kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhanappahānena pajahanto.
atk-s0517a:1272_2: Nekkhammavasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti paṭiladdhassa nekkhammassa vasena taṃsampayuttacittaṃ adhitiṭṭhati adhikaṃ karonto tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0517a:1273_1: Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vāti bālajanaparikappitassa kārakavedakasaṅkhātassa attano abhāvā cakkhu attena ca suññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1273_4: Attaniyena vāti attano abhāveneva attano santakassapi abhāvā attano santakena ca suññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1273_5: Lokassa attāti ca attaniyanti ca ubhayathā gāhasambhavato tadubhayagāhapaṭisedhanatthaṃ attābhāvo ca attaniyābhāvo ca vutto.
atk-s0517a:1273_6: Niccena vāti bhaṅgaṃ atikkamitvā tiṭṭhantassa kassaci abhāvato niccena ca suññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1273_7: Dhuvena vāti pavattikkhaṇepi thirassa kassaci abhāvato dhuvena ca suññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1273_8: Sassatena vāti sabbakālepi vijjamānassa kassaci abhāvato sassatena ca suññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1273_9: Avipariṇāmadhammena vāti jarābhaṅgavasena dvidhā aparivattamānapakatikassa kassaci abhāvato avipariṇāmadhammena ca suññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1273_10: Atha vā niccabhāvena ca dhuvabhāvena ca sassatabhāvena ca avipariṇāmadhammabhāvena ca suññanti attho.
atk-s0517a:1273_12: Yathābhūtaṃ jānato passatoti iccevaṃ anattānupassanāñāṇena yathāsabhāvena jānantassa cakkhunā viya ca passantassa.
atk-s0517a:1273_13: Cakkhābhinivesato ñāṇaṃ vivaṭṭatīti cakkhu attāti vā attaniyanti vā pavattamānato diṭṭhābhinivesato tadaṅgappahānavasena ñāṇaṃ vivaṭṭati.
atk-s0517a:1274_1: Nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ vosajjatīti nekkhammalābhī puggalo nekkhammena tappaṭipakkhaṃ kāmacchandaṃ pariccajati.
atk-s0517a:1274_2: Vosagge paññāti kāmacchandassa vosaggabhūte nekkhamme taṃsampayuttā paññā.
atk-s0517a:1274_6: maggasamaṅgīpuggalo dukkhassa catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ kiccavasena parijānanto dubhato vuṭṭhānavasena vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0517a:1275_1: Tathaṭṭhe paññāti etassa puggalasseva tathaṭṭhe vivaṭṭanā paññā.
atk-s0517a:1275_3: Idāni maggakkhaṇe eva kiccavasena ākāranānattato cha vivaṭṭañāṇāni dassetuṃ saññāvivaṭṭotiādimātikaṃ
atk-s0517a:1275_4: ṭhapetvā taṃ atthato vibhajanto sañjānanto vivaṭṭatītiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1275_5: Tattha sañjānanto vivaṭṭatīti saññāvivaṭṭoti yasmā pubbabhāge nekkhammādiṃ adhipatito sañjānanto yogī
atk-s0517a:1275_7: tasmā taṃ ñāṇaṃ saññāvivaṭṭo nāmāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1275_8: Cetayanto vivaṭṭatīti cetovivaṭṭoti yasmā yogī nekkhammekattādīni cetayanto sampayuttañāṇena kāmacchandādito vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0517a:1275_9: tasmā taṃ ñāṇaṃ cetovivaṭṭo nāmāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1275_10: Vijānanto vivaṭṭatīti cittavivaṭṭoti yasmā yogī nekkhammādivasena cittādhiṭṭhānena vijānanto taṃsampayuttañāṇena kāmacchandādito vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0517a:1275_11: tasmā taṃ ñāṇaṃ cittavivaṭṭo nāmāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1275_12: Ñāṇaṃ karonto vivaṭṭatīti ñāṇavivaṭṭoti yasmā yogī chabbidhaṃ ajjhattikāyatanaṃ anattānupassanāñāṇena
atk-s0517a:1275_13: suññato viditaṃ karonto teneva ñāṇena diṭṭhābhinivesato vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0517a:1275_14: tasmā taṃ ñāṇaṃ ñāṇavivaṭṭo nāmāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1275_15: Vosajjanto vivaṭṭatīti vimokkhavivaṭṭoti yasmā yogī nekkhammādīhi kāmacchandādīni vosajjanto taṃsampayuttañāṇena kāmacchandādito vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0517a:1275_16: tasmā taṃ ñāṇaṃ vimokkhavivaṭṭo nāmāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1275_17: Tathaṭṭhe vivaṭṭatīti saccavivaṭṭoti yasmā yogī catubbidhe tathaṭṭhe dubhato vuṭṭhānavasena vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0517a:1275_19: Maggañāṇameva vā tathaṭṭhe dubhato vuṭṭhānabhāvena vivaṭṭatīti saccavivaṭṭoti attho.
atk-s0517a:1276_0: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭotiādi saccavivaṭṭañāṇaniddese vuttattā saccavivaṭṭañāṇakkhaṇameva sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1276_2: Ñāṇavivaṭṭe ñāṇañhi vajjetvā sesesu ariyamaggo sarūpeneva āgato.
atk-s0517a:1276_3: Vipassanākiccassa pana maggeneva sijjhanato vipassanākiccasiddhivasena ñāṇavivaṭṭañāṇampi maggakkhaṇe yujjati.
atk-s0517a:1276_4: Maggañāṇeneva vā “cakkhu suñña”ntiādi kiccavasena paṭividdhameva hotīti maggakkhaṇe taṃ ñāṇaṃ vattuṃ yujjatiyeva.
atk-s0517a:1276_8: tattha saññāvivaṭṭo”ti evamādinā nayena sabbasaṃsandanesu yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0517a:1276_9: Atha vā saññāvivaṭṭacetovivaṭṭacittavivaṭṭavimokkhavivaṭṭesu catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ āgatattā saccavivaṭṭo āgatoyeva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1276_10: Ñāṇavivaṭṭo ca saccavivaṭṭeneva kiccavasena siddho hoti.
atk-s0517a:1276_11: Saññācetocittavimokkhavivaṭṭesveva ca peyyāle vitthāriyamāne “anattānupassanādhipatattā paññā abhinivesato
atk-s0517a:1276_12: saññāya vivaṭṭatīti adhipatattā paññā saññāvivaṭṭe ñāṇa”nti ca,
atk-s0517a:1276_15: Anattānupassanekattaṃ cetayato abhinivesato cittaṃ vivaṭṭatīti nānatte paññā cetovivaṭṭe ñāṇa”nti ca,
atk-s0517a:1276_16: “abhinivesaṃ pajahanto anattānupassanāvasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti adhiṭṭhāne paññā cittavivaṭṭe ñāṇa”nti ca,
atk-s0517a:1276_17: “anattānupassanāya abhinivesaṃ vosajjatīti vosagge paññā vimokkhavivaṭṭe ñāṇa”nti ca pāṭhasambhavato ñāṇavivaṭṭe ñāṇampi tesu āgatameva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1276_18: Ñāṇavivaṭṭe ca anattānupassanāya vuṭṭhāya ariyamaggaṃ paṭiladdhassa kiccavasena “cakkhu suññaṃ attena
atk-s0517a:1276_20: tasmā ekekasmiṃ vivaṭṭe sesā pañca pañca vivaṭṭā labbhanti.
atk-s0517a:1279_1: Iddhividhañāṇaniddesaṃ idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu.
atk-s0517a:1279_8: Samannāgatanti chandasamādhinā ca padhānasaṅkhārehi ca upetaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1279_10: ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhīti saṅkhaṃ gatānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1279_17: Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhāresu ekekaṃ iddhiṃ katvā dvīhi dvīhi saha sesavacanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1279_18: Evañhi cattāro khandhā sabbe ca phassādayo dhammā saṅgahitā honti.
atk-s0517a:1279_20: Yatheva hi chandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhi chandasamādhīti vutto,
atk-s0517a:1279_21: evaṃ vīriyaṃ cittaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1279_22: Evamekekasmiṃ iddhipāde chandādayo vīriyādayo cittādayo vīmaṃsādayoti tayo tayo dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi,
atk-s0517a:1279_23: sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyeva.
atk-s0517a:1279_24: Yasmā vā ime tayo tayo dhammā sampayuttakehi catūhi khandhehi saddhiṃyeva ijjhanti,
atk-s0517a:1279_26: tasmā tena pariyāyena sabbe cattāropi khandhā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi nāma honti,
atk-s0517a:1280_0: Vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatanti ettha pana vīriyanti ca padhānasaṅkhāroti ca ekoyeva.
atk-s0517a:1280_4: Evaṃ dvidhā vuttattā eva cetthāpi tayo tayo dhammāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1280_5: Keci pana “vibhaṅge ‘iddhīti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā’ti vuttattā iddhi nāma anipphannā,
atk-s0517a:1280_7: Idha pana iddhipi iddhipādopi nipphanno lakkhaṇabbhāhatoti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1280_8: Iddhi samiddhītiādīhi ijjhanākārena dhammā eva vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1281_1: Suttantabhājanīye viya idhāpi iddhipādabhāvanā lokiyā eva.
atk-s0517a:1281_2: Tasmā iddhividhaṃ tāva sampādetukāmo lokiyaṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvento pathavīkasiṇādīsu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu adhikatavasippattaaṭṭhasamāpattiko
atk-s0517a:1281_3: kasiṇānulomato kasiṇapaṭilomato kasiṇānulomapaṭilomato jhānānulomato jhānapaṭilomato jhānānulomapaṭilomato
atk-s0517a:1281_4: jhānukkantikato kasiṇukkantikato jhānakasiṇukkantikato aṅgasaṅkantikato ārammaṇasaṅkantikato aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantikato
atk-s0517a:1281_5: aṅgavavatthānato ārammaṇavavatthānatoti imehi cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ paridametvā chandasīsavīriyasīsacittasīsavīmaṃsāsīsavasena
atk-s0517a:1281_8: Pubbahetusampannena pana kasiṇesu catukkajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasināpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti taṃ taṃ iddhipādaṃ
atk-s0517a:1281_9: samādhiṃ bhāvento “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāyā”tiādikaṃ catuppakāraṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0517a:1281_11: tassa ca hānivuddhiyo ñatvā vīriyasamataṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1281_12: So evaṃ catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāvetvā iddhividhaṃ sampādeti.
atk-s0517a:1282_0: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesūtiādīsu soti so bhāvitacaturiddhipādo bhikkhu.
atk-s0517a:1282_1: Catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāvetīti punappunaṃ chandādīsu ekekaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā jhānasamāpajjanavasena tesu cittaṃ paribhāveti nāma,
atk-s0517a:1282_6: Muduṃ karotīti tathā dantaṃ cittaṃ vasippattaṃ karoti.
atk-s0517a:1282_9: Mudu hi cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti sudhantamiva suvaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1282_12: Kāyampi citte samodahatītiādi iddhikaraṇakāle yathāsukhaṃ cittacārassa ijjhanatthaṃ yogavidhānaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1282_13: Tattha kāyampi citte samodahatīti attano karajakāyampi pādakajjhānacitte samodahati paveseti āropeti,
atk-s0517a:1282_15: Evaṃ karaṇaṃ adissamānena kāyena gamanassa upakārāya hoti.
atk-s0517a:1282_16: Cittampi kāye samodahatīti pādakajjhānacittaṃ attano karajakāye samodahati āropeti,
atk-s0517a:1282_18: Evaṃ karaṇaṃ dissamānena kāyena gamanassa upakārāya hoti.
atk-s0517a:1282_21: Kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmetīti pādakajjhānacittaṃ gahetvā karajakāye āropeti kāyānugatikaṃ karoti,
atk-s0517a:1282_23: Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmetīti karajakāyaṃ gahetvā pādakajjhānacitte āropeti,
atk-s0517a:1282_31: tasmā tesaṃ dvinnaṃyeva padānaṃ vasena pariṇāmetvāti adhiṭṭhahitvāti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1283_0: Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca kāye okkamitvā viharatīti catutthajjhānena sahajātasukhasaññañca lahusaññañca
atk-s0517a:1283_2: Tāya saññāya okkantakāyassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu viya lahuko hoti.
atk-s0517a:1283_12: Cittaṃ abhinīharatīti so bhikkhu vuttappakāravasena tasmiṃ citte abhiññāpādake jāte iddhividhañāṇādhigamatthāya parikammacittaṃ abhinīharati,
atk-s0517a:1284_2: Tattha ekopi hutvāti iddhikaraṇato pubbe pakatiyā ekopi hutvā.
atk-s0517a:1284_3: Bahudhā hotīti bahunnaṃ santike caṅkamitukāmo vā,
atk-s0517a:1284_5: pañhaṃ vā pucchitukāmo hutvā satampi sahassampi hoti.
atk-s0517a:1284_7: Iddhiyā bhūmipādapadamūlabhūte dhamme sampādetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati,
atk-s0517a:1284_8: “sataṃ homi sataṃ homī”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1284_12: puna parikammaṃ katvā dutiyampi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1284_18: Adhiṭṭhānacittampi tatheva satārammaṇaṃ vā sahassārammaṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0517a:1284_19: taṃ paṭhamappanācittamiva gotrabhuanantaraṃ ekameva uppajjati rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1284_21: te aniyametvā nimmitattā iddhimatā sadisāva honti.
atk-s0517a:1284_22: Ṭhānanisajjādīsu vā bhāsitatuṇhībhāvādīsu vā yaṃ yaṃ iddhimā karoti,
atk-s0517a:1284_25: keci paṭhamavaye keci majjhimavaye keci pacchimavaye,
atk-s0517a:1284_26: tathā dīghakese upaḍḍhamuṇḍamuṇḍe missakakese upaḍḍharattacīvare paṇḍukacīvare padabhāṇadhammakathāsarabhaññapañhapucchanapañhavissajjanarajanapacanacīvarasibbanadhovanādīni karonte,
atk-s0517a:1284_28: tena pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ettakā bhikkhū paṭhamavayā hontū”tiādinā nayena parikammaṃ katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1284_32: iminā hi bhikkhunā evaṃ bahubhāvaṃ nimminitvā puna “ekova hutvā caṅkamissāmi,
atk-s0517a:1284_34: pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā vā “ayaṃ vihāro appabhikkhuko,
atk-s0517a:1284_36: kuto ime ettakā ekasadisā bhikkhū addhā therassa esānubhāvoti maṃ jānissantī”ti appicchatāya vā antarāva
atk-s0517a:1284_37: “eko homī”ti icchantena pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “eko homī”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna samāpajjitvā
atk-s0517a:1284_40: Evaṃ akaronto pana yathāparicchinnakālavasena sayameva eko hoti.
atk-s0517a:1285_4: Tatrāyaṃ iddhimā āvibhāvaṃ kattukāmo andhakāraṃ vā ālokaṃ karoti,
atk-s0517a:1285_7: Ayañhi yathā paṭicchannopi dūre ṭhitopi vā dissati,
atk-s0517a:1285_8: evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā kattukāmo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “idaṃ andhakāraṃ ālokajātaṃ hotū”ti vā,
atk-s0517a:1285_10: “idaṃ anāpāthaṃ āpāthaṃ hotū”ti vā āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1285_14: Tirobhāvaṃ kattukāmo pana ālokaṃ vā andhakāraṃ karoti,
atk-s0517a:1285_17: Ayañhi yathā appaṭicchannopi samīpe ṭhitopi vā na dissati,
atk-s0517a:1285_18: evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā kattukāmo pādakajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā “idaṃ ālokaṭṭhānaṃ andhakāraṃ hotū”ti vā,
atk-s0517a:1285_20: “idaṃ āpāthaṃ anāpāthaṃ hotū”ti vā āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1285_30: Taṃ mahakasuttena ca brahmanimantanikasuttena ca dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1286_8: Evaṃ gantukāmena pana ākāsakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya kuṭṭaṃ vā pākāraṃ vā pabbataṃ vā āvajjitvā kataparikammena “ākāso hotū”ti adhiṭṭhātabbo,
atk-s0517a:1286_14: Sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassa antarā pabbato vā rukkho vā uṭṭheti,
atk-s0517a:1286_17: Puna samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhānañhi upajjhāyassa santike nissayaggahaṇasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1286_18: Iminā pana bhikkhunā “ākāso hotū”ti adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyeva.
atk-s0517a:1286_19: Purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā añño pabbato vā rukkho vā utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1286_20: Aññena iddhimatā nimmite pana paṭhamaṃ nimmānaṃ balavaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1286_21: Itarena tassa uddhaṃ vā adho vā gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1287_3: Evaṃ kattukāmena pana āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya “ettake ṭhāne pathavī udakaṃ hotū”ti paricchinditvā
atk-s0517a:1287_5: Saha adhiṭṭhānā yathāparicchinne ṭhāne pathavī udakameva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1287_6: So tattha ummujjanimujjaṃ karoti seyyathāpi udake.
atk-s0517a:1287_12: taṃ taṃ “idañcidañca ettakaṃ hotū”ti āvajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1287_13: Uddharitvā bhājanagataṃ karontassa sappi sappiyeva hoti,
atk-s0517a:1287_18: Tasseva ca sā pathavī udakaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1287_23: Sace panāyaṃ “tesampi udakaṃ hotū”ti icchati, hotiyeva.
atk-s0517a:1287_24: Paricchinnakālaṃ pana atikkamitvā yaṃ pakatiyā ghaṭataḷākādīsu udakaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1287_25: taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ paricchinnaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīyeva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1288_0: Udakepi abhijjamāne gacchatīti ettha yaṃ udakaṃ akkamitvā saṃsīdati,
atk-s0517a:1288_3: Evaṃ gantukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “ettake ṭhāne udakaṃ pathavī hotū”ti paricchinditvā
atk-s0517a:1288_5: Saha adhiṭṭhānā yathāparicchinnaṭṭhāne udakaṃ pathavīyeva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1288_14: Tasseva ca taṃ udakaṃ pathavī hoti,
atk-s0517a:1288_16: Macchakacchapā ca udakakākādayo ca yathāruci vicaranti.
atk-s0517a:1288_17: Sace panāyaṃ aññesampi manussānaṃ taṃ pathaviṃ kātuṃ icchati,
atk-s0517a:1289_0: Ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamatīti antalikkhe samantato ūrubaddhāsanena gacchati.
atk-s0517a:1289_3: Tādiso hi ākāse gantuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0517a:1289_4: Evamākāse gantukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace nisinno gantumicchati,
atk-s0517a:1289_5: pallaṅkappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā parikammaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1289_9: maggappamāṇanti evaṃ yathānurūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā vuttanayeneva “pathavī hotū”ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1289_11: Ākāse gantukāmena ca bhikkhunā dibbacakkhulābhināpi bhavitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0517a:1289_12: Yasmā antarā utusamuṭṭhānā vā pabbatarukkhādayo honti,
atk-s0517a:1289_16: Pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “ākāso hotū”ti parikammaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1289_17: Apica okāse orohaṇatthampi iminā dibbacakkhulābhinā bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1289_18: Ayañhi sace anokāse nhānatitthe vā gāmadvāre vā orohati,
atk-s0517a:1289_20: tasmā dibbacakkhunā passitvā anokāsaṃ vajjetvā okāse otaratīti.
atk-s0517a:1290_0: Imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāveti ettha candimasūriyānaṃ dvācattālīsayojanasahassoparicaraṇena mahiddhikatā,
atk-s0517a:1290_1: tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā,
atk-s0517a:1290_11: Sace pana idheva nisinnako vā nipannako vā parāmasitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1290_13: Adhiṭṭhānabalena vaṇṭā muttatālaphalaṃ viya āgantvā hatthapāse ṭhite vā parāmasati,
atk-s0517a:1290_15: Hatthaṃ vaḍḍhentassa pana kiṃ upādinnakaṃ vaḍḍhati anupādinnakaṃ vāti?
atk-s0517a:1290_17: Yo evaṃ katvā na kevalaṃ candimasūriye parāmasati,
atk-s0517a:1290_25: Anekesupi hi bhikkhusatasahassesu evaṃ karontesu tesañca ekamekassa tatheva ijjhati.
atk-s0517a:1290_27: Yathā hi pātisahassesu udakapūresu sabbapātīsu candamaṇḍalāni dissanti,
atk-s0517a:1290_30: Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetīti brahmalokaṃ paricchedaṃ katvā etthantare anekavidhaṃ abhiññaṃ karonto attano kāyena vasaṃ issariyaṃ vatteti.
atk-s0517a:1293_1: Sotadhātuvisuddhiñāṇaniddese dūrepi saddānantiādi dibbasotaṃ uppādetukāmassa ādikammikassa bhikkhuno upāyasandassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1293_2: Tattha dūrepi saddānaṃ saddanimittanti dūre saddānaṃ antare saddaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1293_10: Imaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādetukāmena ādikammikena jhāyinā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya parikammasamādhicittena
atk-s0517a:1293_11: paṭhamataraṃ pakatisotapathe dūre oḷāriko araññe sīhādīnaṃ saddo āvajjitabbo.
atk-s0517a:1293_12: Vihāre ghaṇḍisaddo bherisaddo saṅkhasaddo sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhūnaṃ sabbathāmena sajjhāyantānaṃ sajjhāyanasaddo pakatikathaṃ kathentānaṃ “kiṃ, bhante, kiṃ,
atk-s0517a:1293_13: āvuso”tiādisaddo sakuṇasaddo vātasaddo padasaddo pakkuthitaudakassa cicciṭāyanasaddo ātape sussamānatālapaṇṇasaddo
atk-s0517a:1293_14: kunthakipillikādisaddoti evaṃ sabboḷārikato pabhuti yathākkamena sukhumasukhumasaddā āvajjitabbā.
atk-s0517a:1294_0: Evaṃ karontena ca puratthimādīsu dasasu disāsu kamena ekekissā disāya saddanimittaṃ vuttanayena manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1294_1: Manasi karontena ca ye saddā pakatisotassa suyyanti,
atk-s0517a:1294_2: tesu pakatisotamodhāya manodvārikena cittena manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1294_3: Tassa te saddā pakaticittassāpi pākaṭā honti,
atk-s0517a:1294_5: Tassevaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasikaroto idāni dibbasotadhātu uppajjissatīti tesu saddesu aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:1294_6: tasmiṃ niruddhe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti.
atk-s0517a:1294_7: Yesaṃ purimāni tīṇi cattāri vā parikammopacārānulomagotrabhunāmakāni kāmāvacarāni,
atk-s0517a:1294_9: Tattha yaṃ tena appanācittena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1294_11: Taṃ thāmagataṃ karontena “etthantare saddaṃ suṇāmī”ti ekaṅgulamattaṃ paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1294_14: tato vā bhiyyopi paricchinditvā paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1294_15: Evaṃ adhigatābhiñño esa pādakajjhānārammaṇena phuṭṭhokāsabbhantaragate sadde puna pādakajjhānaṃ asamāpajjitvāpi abhiññāñāṇena suṇātiyeva.
atk-s0517a:1294_16: Evaṃ suṇanto ca sacepi yāvabrahmalokā saṅkhabheripaṇavādisaddehi ekakolāhalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1294_19: Abhiññāñāṇena sute sātthake sadde pacchā kāmāvacaracittena atthaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0517a:1294_22: Pacchā pakatisote vinaṭṭhepi dibbasotaṃ na vinassatīti vadanti.
atk-s0517a:1295_0: So dibbāya sotadhātuyāti ettha dibbasadisattā dibbā.
atk-s0517a:1295_1: Devānañhi sucaritakammābhinibbattā pittasemharudhirādīhi apalibuddhā upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthā
atk-s0517a:1295_3: Ayañcāpi imassa bhikkhuno vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattā ñāṇasotadhātu tādisāyevāti dibbasadisattā dibbā.
atk-s0517a:1295_10: Atikkantamānusikāyāti manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā saddasavanena mānusikaṃ maṃsasotadhātuṃ atikkantāya vītivattitvā ṭhitāya.
atk-s0517a:1295_11: Ubho sadde suṇātīti dve sadde suṇāti.
atk-s0517a:1295_16: Ye dūre santike cāti ye saddā dūre paracakkavāḷepi,
atk-s0517a:1298_1: Cetopariyañāṇaniddese so evaṃ pajānātīti idāni vattabbaṃ vidhānaṃ upadisati.
atk-s0517a:1298_2: Idaṃ rūpaṃ somanassindriyasamuṭṭhitantiādi ādikammikena jhāyinā paṭipajjitabbaṃ vidhānaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0517a:1298_3: Etañhi ñāṇaṃ uppādetukāmena jhāyinā paṭhamaṃ tāva dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1298_6: Tasmā tena bhikkhunā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā parassa hadayarūpaṃ nissāya vattamānassa lohitassa
atk-s0517a:1298_8: Tañhi lohitaṃ kusalasomanasse vattamāne rattaṃ hoti nigrodhapakkavaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1298_10: domanasse vattamāne kāḷakaṃ hoti jambupakkavaṇṇaṃ luḷitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1298_15: idaṃ rūpaṃ upekkhindriyasamuṭṭhita”nti parassa hadayalohitavaṇṇaṃ passitvā passitvā cittaṃ pariyesantena cetopariyañāṇaṃ thāmagataṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1298_16: Evaṃ thāmagate hi tasmiṃ anukkamena sabbampi kāmāvacarādibhedaṃ cittaṃ pajānāti cittā cittameva saṅkamanto vinā hadayarūpadassanena.
atk-s0517a:1299_0: “Āruppe parassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo kassa hadayarūpaṃ passati,
atk-s0517a:1299_4: yadidaṃ yattha katthaci cittaṃ āvajjanto soḷasappabhedaṃ cittaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0517a:1300_2: veneyyavasena pana desanāvilāsena ca byañjanena nānattaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1300_3: Cetasā ceto paricca pajānātīti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ paricchinditvā sarāgādivasena nānappakārato jānāti.
atk-s0517a:1300_6: Tattha aṭṭhavidhaṃ lobhasahagatacittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ nāma,
atk-s0517a:1300_9: dve vicikicchāuddhaccacittānīti imāni pana cattāri cittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:1300_10: Keci pana therā tānipi vītarāgapadena saṅgaṇhanti.
atk-s0517a:1300_11: Duvidhaṃ pana domanassasahagataṃ cittaṃ sadosaṃ cittaṃ nāma,
atk-s0517a:1300_13: Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:1300_14: Keci pana therā tānipi vītadosapadena saṅgaṇhanti.
atk-s0517a:1300_15: Samohaṃ vītamohanti ettha pana mohekahetukavasena vicikicchāuddhaccasahagatadvayameva samohaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1300_16: Mohassa pana sabbākusalesu sambhavato dvādasavidhampi akusalaṃ cittaṃ “samoha”nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1300_28: Iti cetopariyañāṇalābhī bhikkhu soḷasappabhedampi cittaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0517a:1300_29: Puthujjanā pana ariyānaṃ maggaphalacittaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0517a:1300_30: ariyāpi ca heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ maggaphalacittaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0517a:1300_31: uparimā uparimā pana heṭṭhimānaṃ heṭṭhimānaṃ cittaṃ jānantīti.
atk-s0517a:1303_1: Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaniddese evaṃ pajānātītiādi catūsu iddhipādesu paribhāvitacittassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1303_3: Kamato hi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passitvā viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanāsaṅkhātaṃ paccuppannaṃ phalasaṅkhepaṃ passati,
atk-s0517a:1303_4: tassa paccayaṃ purimabhave kammakilesasaṅkhātaṃ hetusaṅkhepaṃ passati,
atk-s0517a:1303_10: imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti idaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaniddesassa uddesavacanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1303_11: Evaṃ tesaṃ aññataravacaneneva atthe siddhe dvidhā vacanaṃ kasmāti ce?
atk-s0517a:1303_17: Iminā sakalena vacanena ahetukavādo paṭisiddho hoti.
atk-s0517a:1303_25: Iminā sakalena vacanena sassatāhetukavādo paṭisiddho hoti.
atk-s0517a:1303_28: Tasmā satipi sahetukatte aniccahetukā ete dhammā na loke niccasammatapakatipurisādihetukāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1304_1: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti ettha yaṃ paṭicca phalameti,
atk-s0517a:1304_5: Etīti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1304_7: avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo.
atk-s0517a:1306_1: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “ime saṅkhārā avijjāpaccayā hontī”ti?
atk-s0517a:1306_3: Yassa hi dukkhādīsu avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1306_4: So dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu ca aññāṇena saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhasaññāya gahetvā tasseva hetubhūte tividhepi saṅkhāre ārabhati.
atk-s0517a:1306_5: Samudaye aññāṇena dukkhahetubhūtepi taṇhāparikkhāre saṅkhāre sukhahetuto maññamāno ārabhati.
atk-s0517a:1306_6: Nirodhe pana magge ca aññāṇena dukkhassa anirodhabhūtepi gativisese dukkhanirodhasaññī hutvā nirodhassa
atk-s0517a:1306_7: ca amaggabhūtesupi yaññāmaratapādīsu nirodhamaggasaññī hutvā dukkhanirodhaṃ patthayamāno yaññāmaratapādimukhena
atk-s0517a:1307_0: Apica so tāya catūsu saccesu appahīnāvijjatāya visesato jātijarārogamaraṇādianekādīnavavokiṇṇampi puññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0517a:1307_1: dukkhaṃ dukkhato ajānanto tassa adhigamāya kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārabhedaṃ puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati devaccharakāmako
atk-s0517a:1307_3: Sukhasammatassāpi ca tassa puññaphalassa ante mahāpariḷāhajanikaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhataṃ appassādatañca
atk-s0517a:1307_4: apassantopi tappaccayaṃ vuttappakārameva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati salabho viya dīpasikhābhinipātaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1307_6: Kāmūpasevanādīsu ca savipākesu ādīnavaṃ apassanto sukhasaññāya ceva kilesābhibhūtatāya ca dvārattayappavattampi
atk-s0517a:1307_9: Āruppavipākesu cāpi saṅkhāravipariṇāmadukkhataṃ anavabujjhamāno sassatādivipallāsena cittasaṅkhārabhūtaṃ
atk-s0517a:1309_0: “Ekaṃ na ekato idha, nānekamanekatopi no ekaṃ;
atk-s0517a:1311_0: Bhagavā hi katthaci padhānattā katthaci pākaṭattā katthaci asādhāraṇattā desanāvilāsassa ca veneyyānañca anurūpato ekameva hetuñca phalañca dīpeti.
atk-s0517a:1311_1: Tasmā ayamidha avijjā vijjamānesupi aññesu vatthārammaṇasahajātadhammādīsu saṅkhārakāraṇesu “assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti ca,
atk-s0517a:1311_2: “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayo”ti ca vacanato aññesampi taṇhādīnaṃ saṅkhārahetūnaṃ hetūti padhānattā, “avidvā,
atk-s0517a:1311_5: asādhāraṇattā ca saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena dīpitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1311_6: Eteneva ca ekekahetuphaladīpanaparihāravacanena sabbattha ekekahetuphaladīpane payojanaṃ veditabbanti.
atk-s0517a:1312_1: evaṃ santepi ekantāniṭṭhaphalāya sāvajjāya avijjāya kathaṃ puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayattaṃ yujjati?
atk-s0517a:1314_0: Dhammānaṃ paccayo siddho, vipākā eva te ca na”.
atk-s0517a:1315_1: sabhāvavasena ca sāvajjāpi samānā sabbesampi etesaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ yathānurūpaṃ ṭhānakiccasabhāvaviruddhāviruddhapaccayavasena
atk-s0517a:1320_0: Avijjā paccayo tesaṃ, tividhānaṃ ayaṃ tato.
atk-s0517a:1325_0: “Yadā ca ñatvā so dhammaṃ, saccāni abhisamessati;
atk-s0517a:1327_0: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti cha viññāṇakāyā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1328_1: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā hotī”ti?
atk-s0517a:1328_7: na ca uppajjantīti jānitabbametaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā idaṃ viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0517a:1328_8: Sabbameva hi idaṃ pavattipaṭisandhivasena dvedhā pavattati.
atk-s0517a:1328_9: Tattha dve pañcaviññāṇāni dve manodhātuyo somanassasahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātūti imāni terasa pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaṃyeva pavattanti,
atk-s0517a:1328_10: sesāni ekūnavīsati tīsu bhavesu yathānurūpaṃ pavattiyampi paṭisandhiyampi pavattanti.
atk-s0517a:1330_0: Nāssa tato saṅkanti, na tato hetuṃ vinā hoti”.
atk-s0517a:1331_0: Iti hetaṃ laddhappaccayaṃ rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ uppajjamānaṃ bhavantaramupetīti vuccati, na satto, na jīvo.
atk-s0517a:1331_1: Tassa ca nāpi atītabhavato idha saṅkanti atthi,
atk-s0517a:1331_2: nāpi tato hetuṃ vinā idha pātubhāvo.
atk-s0517a:1332_1: nanu evaṃ asaṅkantipātubhāve sati ye imasmiṃ manussattabhāve khandhā,
atk-s0517a:1332_4: aññassa aññato ca taṃ phalaṃ siyā.
atk-s0517a:1332_5: Upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā.
atk-s0517a:1333_0: “Santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ, nāññassa na ca aññato;
atk-s0517a:1337_0: Yopi vadeyya “evaṃ santepi ete saṅkhārā vijjamānā vā phalassa paccayā siyuṃ avijjamānā vā.
atk-s0517a:1337_4: pavattito pubbe pacchā ca niccaṃ phalāvahā siyu”nti.
atk-s0517a:1338_0: “Katattā paccayā ete, na ca niccaṃ phalāvahā;
atk-s0517a:1340_0: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti idha vedanā saññā saṅkhārakkhandhā nāmaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1340_1: cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ rūpaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1340_2: Abhāvakagabbhaseyyakānaṃ aṇḍajānañca paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthudasakaṃ kāyadasakanti vīsati rūpāni,
atk-s0517a:1340_3: tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tevīsati dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1340_5: opapātikasattesu brahmakāyikādīnaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe cakkhusotavatthudasakāni jīvitindriyanavakañcāti ekūnacattālīsa rūpāni,
atk-s0517a:1340_6: tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete dvācattālīsa dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1340_7: Kāmabhave pana sesaopapātikānaṃ saṃsedajānaṃ vā sabhāvakaparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyavatthubhāvadasakānīti
atk-s0517a:1340_9: tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tesattati dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1340_11: Avakaṃsena pana taṃtaṃdasakavikalānaṃ tassa tassa vasena hāpetvā hāpetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpasaṅkhā veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1341_3: Sutte hi “cittānuparivattino dhammā”tiādinā nayena bahudhā vedanādīnaṃ viññāṇapaccayatā siddhā.
atk-s0517a:1342_0: Cittajena hi rūpena, idha diṭṭhena sijjhati;
atk-s0517a:1344_1: Idha pana rūpaṃ niyamato cattāri bhūtāni cha vatthūni jīvitindriyanti ekādasavidhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1345_3: Tassa tassa hi nāmassa rūpassa ca bhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1351_0: Chaḷeva tā pabhedena, idha bāttiṃsa vedanā”.
atk-s0517a:1360_1: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “bhavo jātiyā paccayo”ti ce?
atk-s0517a:1360_3: Bāhirānañhi janakajananisukkasoṇitāhārādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ samattepi sattānaṃ yamakānampi sataṃ hīnappaṇītatādiviseso dissati.
atk-s0517a:1360_4: So ca na ahetuko sabbadā ca sabbesañca abhāvato,
atk-s0517a:1360_5: na kammabhavato aññahetuko tadabhinibbattakasattānaṃ ajjhattasantāne aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti kammabhavahetukoyeva.
atk-s0517a:1361_0: Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇantiādīsu yasmā asati jātiyā jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma sokādayo vā dhammā na honti,
atk-s0517a:1361_1: jātiyā pana sati jarāmaraṇañceva jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātadukkhadhammaphuṭṭhassa ca bālassa jarāmaraṇābhisambandhā
atk-s0517a:1361_2: vā tena tena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa anabhisambandhā vā sokādayo ca dhammā honti,
atk-s0517a:1361_3: tasmā ayaṃ jāti jarāmaraṇassa ceva sokādīnañca paccayo hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1362_0: So tathābhāvitena cittenātiādīsu pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāyāti etassa ñāṇassa adhigamāya,
atk-s0517a:1362_5: Pubbenivāsanti samanantarātītaṃ bhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1362_6: Anussaratīti khandhapaṭipāṭivasena cutipaṭisandhivasena vā anugantvā anugantvā sarati.
atk-s0517a:1362_7: Imañhi pubbenivāsaṃ cha janā anussaranti titthiyā pakatisāvakā mahāsāvakā aggasāvakā paccekabuddhā buddhāti.
atk-s0517a:1362_19: paṭipāṭiṃ muñcitvā cutipaṭisandhivasena sarituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0517a:1362_26: Ekassa attabhāvassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhiṃ passanti,
atk-s0517a:1362_27: puna aparassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhinti evaṃ cutipaṭisandhivaseneva saṅkamantā gacchanti,
atk-s0517a:1362_31: Tesañhi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu heṭṭhā vā upari vā yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0517a:1362_33: Tasmā anekāpi kappakoṭiyo saṅkhipitvā yaṃ yaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0517a:1362_35: Evaṃ gacchantānañca nesaṃ ñāṇaṃ antarantarāsu jātīsu asajjamānaṃ icchiticchitaṭṭhānameva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0517a:1363_0: Imesu pana chasu pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantesu titthiyānaṃ pubbenivāsadassanaṃ khajjopanakappabhāsadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0517a:1363_6: Titthiyānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0517a:1363_12: Imasmiṃ pana adhikāre sāvakānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1364_0: Tasmā evaṃ anussaritukāmena ādikammikena bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena rahogatena paṭisallīnena
atk-s0517a:1364_1: paṭipāṭiyā cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā abhiññāpādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vuttanayena paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0517a:1364_3: Tato āsanapaññāpanaṃ senāsanappavesanaṃ pattacīvarapaṭisāmanaṃ bhojanakālo gāmato āgamanakālo gāme piṇḍāya
atk-s0517a:1364_4: caritakālo gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhakālo vihārato nikkhamanakālo cetiyabodhivandanakālo pattadhovanakālo
atk-s0517a:1364_5: pattapaṭiggahaṇakālo pattapaṭiggahaṇato yāva mukhadhovanā katakiccaṃ paccūsakāle katakiccaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1364_6: majjhimayāme paṭhamayāme katakiccanti evaṃ paṭilomakkamena sakalaṃ rattindivaṃ katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1364_9: Sace panettha kiñci na pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:1364_11: Ettakena dīpe jalite viya pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1364_12: Evaṃ paṭilomakkameneva dutiyadivasepi tatiyacatutthapañcamadivasesupi dasāhepi addhamāsepi māsepi saṃvaccharepi katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1364_13: Eteneva upāyena dasa vassāni vīsati vassānīti yāva imasmiṃ bhave attano paṭisandhi,
atk-s0517a:1364_14: tāva āvajjantena purimabhave cutikkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmarūpaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1364_15: Pahoti hi paṇḍito bhikkhu paṭhamavāreneva paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0517a:1364_16: Yasmā pana purimabhave nāmarūpaṃ asesaṃ niruddhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1364_18: tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ āhundarikaṃ andhatamamiva hoti sududdasaṃ duppaññena.
atk-s0517a:1364_19: Tenāpi “na sakkomahaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe nāmarūpārammaṇaṃ kātu”nti dhuranikkhepo na kātabbo.
atk-s0517a:1364_20: Tadeva pana pādakajjhānaṃ punappunaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya vuṭṭhāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1365_0: Evaṃ karonto hi seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso kūṭāgārakaṇṇikatthāya mahārukkhaṃ chindanto sākhāpalāsacchedanamatteneva
atk-s0517a:1365_1: pharasudhārāya vipannāya mahārukkhaṃ chindituṃ asakkontopi dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvāva kammārasālaṃ gantvā
atk-s0517a:1365_2: tikhiṇaṃ pharasuṃ kārāpetvā puna āgantvā chindeyya,
atk-s0517a:1365_3: puna vipannāya ca punapi tatheva kāretvā chindeyya,
atk-s0517a:1365_4: so evaṃ chindanto chinnassa chinnassa puna chettabbābhāvato achinnassa ca chedanato nacirasseva mahārukkhaṃ pāteyya,
atk-s0517a:1365_5: evameva pādakajjhānā vuṭṭhāya pubbe āvajjitaṃ anāvajjitvā paṭisandhimeva āvajjanto taṃ nacirasseva paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0517a:1365_7: Tattha pacchimanisajjato pabhuti yāva paṭisandhito ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-s0517a:1365_10: Taṃ atītaṃsañāṇassa rūpāvacarattā rūpāvacaraṃ sandhāya vacanaṃ na yujjati.
atk-s0517a:1365_11: Yadā panassa bhikkhuno paṭisandhiṃ atikkamma cutikkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1365_13: tadāssa tena cittena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1365_14: Tena ñāṇena sampayuttāya satiyā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
atk-s0517a:1366_3: Tattha ekampi jātinti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1366_5: Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo tadā sabbesaṃ brahmaloke sannipatanato.
atk-s0517a:1366_6: Vaḍḍhamāno kappo vivaṭṭakappo tadā brahmalokato sattānaṃ vivaṭṭanato.
atk-s0517a:1366_7: Tattha saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti taṃmūlakattā.
atk-s0517a:1366_22: taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu”nti vuttāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni pariggahitāni honti.
atk-s0517a:1367_14: Vitthārato pana sadāpi ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassati.
atk-s0517a:1367_31: Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati,
atk-s0517a:1367_32: tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettaṃ vinaṭṭhameva hoti,
atk-s0517a:1368_2: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe ekaṃ mahāvassaṃ vassati.
atk-s0517a:1368_4: Sassesu pana gokhāyitakamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṃ ravanto ekabindumattampi na vassati,
atk-s0517a:1368_8: Evaṃ dīghe addhāne vītivatte tattha tattha udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0517a:1368_9: Athānukkamena macchakacchapāpi kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbattanti,
atk-s0517a:1368_17: Tadā hi “vassasatasahassassa accayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā muttasirā
atk-s0517a:1368_18: vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā
atk-s0517a:1368_23: ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā uddayhissanti vinassissanti,
atk-s0517a:1368_24: yāva brahmalokā lokavināso bhavissati. Mettaṃ, mārisā, bhāvetha. Karuṇaṃ… muditaṃ… upekkhaṃ, mārisā, bhāvetha.
atk-s0517a:1368_28: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummā devā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā devaloke nibbattanti.
atk-s0517a:1368_29: Tattha dibbasudhābhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti.
atk-s0517a:1368_30: Tadaññe pana aparapariyavedanīyena kammena devaloke nibbattanti.
atk-s0517a:1368_31: Aparapariyavedanīyakammarahito hi saṃsāre saṃsaranto nāma satto natthi.
atk-s0517a:1368_33: Evaṃ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattantīti.
atk-s0517a:1369_0: Vassūpacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati,
atk-s0517a:1369_8: Tattha pakatisūriye vattamāne ākāse valāhakāpi dhūmasikhāpi caranti.
atk-s0517a:1369_9: Kappavināsakasūriye vattamāne vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ nabhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1369_10: Ṭhapetvā pañca mahānadiyo sesakunnadīādīsu udakaṃ sussati.
atk-s0517a:1370_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā mahānadiyopi sussanti.
atk-s0517a:1371_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati,
atk-s0517a:1372_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati,
atk-s0517a:1372_1: yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1373_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati,
atk-s0517a:1373_1: yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekadhūmaṃ hoti pariyādinnasinehaṃ dhūmena.
atk-s0517a:1374_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati,
atk-s0517a:1374_1: yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi.
atk-s0517a:1374_10: Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā pana sappitelajhāpanaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā nibbāyati.
atk-s0517a:1374_11: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro.
atk-s0517a:1375_0: Atha dīghassa addhuno accayena mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā paṭhamaṃ sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ vassati.
atk-s0517a:1375_1: Anupubbena kumudanāḷayaṭṭhimusalatālakkhandhādippamāṇāhi dhārāhi vassanto koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu sabbaṃ daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā antaradhāyati.
atk-s0517a:1375_2: Taṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti parivaṭumaṃ paduminipatte udakabindusadisaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1375_3: Kathaṃ tāva mahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ ghanaṃ karotīti ce?
atk-s0517a:1375_5: Taṃ hissa tahiṃ tahiṃ vivaraṃ deti.
atk-s0517a:1375_6: Taṃ evaṃ vātena sampiṇḍiyamānaṃ ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati.
atk-s0517a:1375_10: Te taṃ pihitadvāre dhamakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṃ katvā rumbhanti.
atk-s0517a:1375_11: Madhurodakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchamānaṃ upari rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0517a:1375_12: Sā vaṇṇasampannā ceva hoti gandharasasampannā ca nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṃ viya.
atk-s0517a:1375_13: Tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā tato cavitvā idhūpapajjanti.
atk-s0517a:1375_15: Te aggaññasutte vuttanayena taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā āluppakārakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti.
atk-s0517a:1376_3: Tato nesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ paripuṇṇapaññāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-s0517a:1376_4: Te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhītānaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito,
atk-s0517a:1376_5: tasmā sūriyo hotū”ti sūriyotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
atk-s0517a:1376_6: Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate “yampi ālokaṃ labhimha,
atk-s0517a:1376_7: sopi no naṭṭho”ti puna bhītā honti,
atk-s0517a:1376_8: tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “sādhu vatassa sace aññaṃ ālokaṃ labheyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0517a:1376_9: Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-s0517a:1376_10: Te taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya uṭṭhito,
atk-s0517a:1376_11: tasmā cando hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
atk-s0517a:1377_0: Evaṃ candimasūriyesu pātubhūtesu nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni pātubhavanti.
atk-s0517a:1377_1: Tato pabhuti rattindivā paññāyanti anukkamena ca māsaddhamāsautusaṃvaccharā.
atk-s0517a:1377_3: Te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavanti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0517a:1377_4: Yathā nāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva pubbuḷakā uṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0517a:1377_7: evamevaṃ thūpathūpaṭṭhāne pabbatā honti ninnaninnaṭṭhāne samuddā samasamaṭṭhāne dīpāti.
atk-s0517a:1378_0: Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ kamena ekacce vaṇṇavanto,
atk-s0517a:1378_5: Atha tesaṃ teneva nayena sopi antaradhāyati,
atk-s0517a:1378_8: akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso suddho sugandhā taṇḍulapphalo.
atk-s0517a:1378_10: Te sāliṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapenti.
atk-s0517a:1378_13: Na tassa sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi,
atk-s0517a:1378_16: Tesaṃ taṃ oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharayataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyati.
atk-s0517a:1378_17: Atha nesaṃ tassa nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti.
atk-s0517a:1378_24: Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa asaddhammassa paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti.
atk-s0517a:1378_25: Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti.
atk-s0517a:1378_26: Tato pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonandhati,
atk-s0517a:1378_28: Te sannipatitvā anutthunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā sattesu pātubhūtā,
atk-s0517a:1378_29: mayañhi pubbe manomayā ahumhā”ti aggaññasutte vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1379_0: Atha aññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati.
atk-s0517a:1379_1: Taṃ dvikkhattuṃ paribhāsitvā tatiyavāre pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti.
atk-s0517a:1379_2: Te evaṃ adinnādānagarahamusāvādadaṇḍādānesu uppannesu sannipatitvā cintayanti “yaṃnūna mayaṃ ekaṃ sattaṃ sammanneyyāma,
atk-s0517a:1379_7: Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena
atk-s0517a:1379_8: tesu sattesu abhirūpataro ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0517a:1379_12: dhammena samena pare rañjetīti rājā”ti tīhi nāmehi paññāyittha.
atk-s0517a:1379_15: Evaṃ bodhisattaṃ ādiṃ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena brāhmaṇādayopi vaṇṇā saṇṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0517a:1379_24: Imāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1379_25: Evaṃ tāva agginā vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1380_0: Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati,
atk-s0517a:1380_1: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvāti pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1380_5: So ādito sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ vassanto anukkamena mahādhārāhi koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānaṃ pūrento vassati.
atk-s0517a:1380_9: tattha tayopi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā subhakiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0517a:1381_0: Udakānugataṃ pana sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasammati,
atk-s0517a:1381_2: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1381_3: Kevalaṃ panidha ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati.
atk-s0517a:1381_4: Subhakiṇhato ca cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti.
atk-s0517a:1381_10: imāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1381_11: Evaṃ udakena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1382_0: Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo vātena vinassati,
atk-s0517a:1382_1: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1382_6: tato saṇharajaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ thūlavālikaṃ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti yāva kūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇe visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe ca uṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0517a:1382_7: Te pathavito nabhamuggatā na puna patanti,
atk-s0517a:1382_9: Athānukkamena heṭṭhāmahāpathaviyā vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃ mūlaṃ katvā ākāse khipati.
atk-s0517a:1382_12: Cakkavāḷapabbatampi sinerupabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati.
atk-s0517a:1382_13: Te aññamaññaṃ abhihantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
atk-s0517a:1382_14: Eteneva upāyena bhūmaṭṭhakavimānāni ca ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni ca vināsento cha kāmāvacaradevaloke vināsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti.
atk-s0517a:1382_17: sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
atk-s0517a:1382_19: tattha tayo brahmaloke vināsetvā vehapphale āhacca tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0517a:1382_21: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1382_22: Idha pana subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati.
atk-s0517a:1382_23: Vehapphalato ca cavitvā subhakiṇhaṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti.
atk-s0517a:1382_28: imāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
atk-s0517a:1382_29: Evaṃ vātena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1383_2: Akusalamūlesu hi ussannesu evaṃ loko vinassati.
atk-s0517a:1383_3: So ca kho rāge ussannatare agginā vinassati,
atk-s0517a:1383_8: Evaṃ vinassantopi ca nirantarameva satta vāre agginā nassati,
atk-s0517a:1383_11: aṭṭhame vāre udakenāti evaṃ aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre vinassanto sattakkhattuṃ udakena vinassitvā puna satta vāre agginā nassati.
atk-s0517a:1383_13: Etthantare udakena nassanavāraṃ sampattampi paṭibāhitvā laddhokāso vāto paripuṇṇacatusaṭṭhikappāyuke subhakiṇhe viddhaṃsento lokaṃ vināseti.
atk-s0517a:1384_0: Pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantopi ca kappānussaraṇako bhikkhu etesu kappesu anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe
atk-s0517a:1384_2: Saṃvaṭṭakappe vivaṭṭakappeti ca kappassa aḍḍhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1384_6: Tattha amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gatiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā āsiṃ.
atk-s0517a:1384_10: Sace pana tasmiṃ kāle attano vaṇṇasampattiṃ vā lūkhapaṇītajīvikabhāvaṃ vā sukhadukkhabahulataṃ vā appāyukadīghāyukabhāvaṃ vā anussaritukāmo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1384_14: Tattha evaṃvaṇṇoti odāto vā sāmo vā.
atk-s0517a:1384_16: Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti anekappakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
atk-s0517a:1384_17: Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ vassasataparimāṇāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasatasahassāyupariyanto vā.
atk-s0517a:1385_0: So tato cuto amutra udapādinti so ahaṃ tato bhavato yonito gatito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato sattanikāyato
atk-s0517a:1385_1: vā cuto puna amukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā udapādiṃ.
atk-s0517a:1385_2: Tatrāpāsinti atha tatrāpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ.
atk-s0517a:1385_4: Apica yasmā amutrāsinti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa yāvaticchakaṃ anussaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1385_6: tasmā idhūpapannoti imissā idhūpapattiyā anantaramevassa upapattiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya amutra udapādinti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1385_7: Tatrāpāsinti evamādi panassa tatra imissā upapattiyā anantare upapattiṭṭhāne nāmagottādīnaṃ anussaraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1385_8: So tato cuto idhūpapannoti svāhaṃ tato anantarūpapattiṭṭhānato cuto idha amukasmiṃ nāma khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattoti.
atk-s0517a:1385_12: Nāmagottena hi satto tisso phusso kassapoti uddisīyati,
atk-s0517a:1388_1: Dibbacakkhuñāṇaniddese ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotīti divā vā rattiṃ vā sūriyajoticandamaṇiālokaṃ ālokoti manasi karoti.
atk-s0517a:1388_2: Evaṃ manasikaronto ca ālokoti saññaṃ manasi pavattanato “ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1388_3: Divāsaññaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti evaṃ ālokasaññaṃ manasikaritvā divāti saññaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0517a:1388_4: Yathā divā tathā rattinti yathā divā āloko diṭṭho,
atk-s0517a:1388_6: Yathā rattiṃ tathā divāti yathā rattiṃ āloko diṭṭho,
atk-s0517a:1388_8: Iti vivaṭena cetasāti evaṃ apihitena cittena.
atk-s0517a:1388_10: Sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvetīti saobhāsaṃ cittaṃ vaḍḍheti.
atk-s0517a:1388_13: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato obhāsajātaṃ cittaṃ hoti vigatandhakārāvaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1388_14: Tena hi dibbacakkhuṃ uppādetukāmena ādikammikena kulaputtena imissāyeva pāḷiyā anusārena kasiṇārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1388_15: abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ sabbākārena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā “tejokasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇa”nti imesu
atk-s0517a:1388_22: Imesu ca pana tīsu ālokakasiṇaṃyeva seṭṭhataraṃ,
atk-s0517a:1388_24: Tasmā ālokakasiṇaṃ itaresaṃ vā aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cattāri jhānāni uppādetvā puna upacārabhūmiyaṃyeva ṭhatvā kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1388_26: Rūpagataṃ passato panassa tena byāpārena parikammacittena ālokapharaṇaṃ akubbato parikammassa vāro atikkamati,
atk-s0517a:1388_29: Athānena punappunaṃ pādakajjhānameva pavisitvā tato vuṭṭhāya āloko pharitabbo.
atk-s0517a:1388_34: Tattha yadā tassa bhikkhuno maṃsacakkhussa anāpāthagataṃ antokucchigataṃ hadayavatthunissitaṃ heṭṭhāpathavītalanissitaṃ
atk-s0517a:1388_35: tirokuṭṭapabbatapākāragataṃ paracakkavāḷagatanti idaṃ rūpaṃ ñāṇacakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0517a:1389_1: vuttappakārametaṃ rūpamārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjane uppajjitvā niruddhe tadeva rūpamārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0517a:1389_2: cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjantīti pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1389_3: Idaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ “sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇa”ntipi “dibbacakkhuñāṇa”ntipi vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1389_5: So hi “yattha yattha āloko hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0517a:1389_6: taṃ taṃ pathavīsamuddapabbate vinivijjhitvāpi ekālokaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1389_7: Athassa tattha bhayānakāni yakkharakkhasādirūpāni passato bhayaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:1390_0: Sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāyāti sattānaṃ cutiyā ca upapāte ca ñāṇāya.
atk-s0517a:1390_1: Yena ñāṇena sattānaṃ cuti ca upapāto ca ñāyati,
atk-s0517a:1391_0: Satte passatīti manussānaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya satte oloketi.
atk-s0517a:1391_1: Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0517a:1391_6: Te evarūpe cavamāne ca upapajjamāne ca passatīti dasseti.
atk-s0517a:1391_7: Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena hīḷite ohīḷite oññāte avaññāte.
atk-s0517a:1392_1: idha bhikkhu heṭṭhānirayābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nerayike satte passati mahādukkhamanubhavamāne,
atk-s0517a:1392_3: So evaṃ manasi karoti “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ dukkhamanubhavantī”ti.
atk-s0517a:1392_5: Tathā uparidevalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nandanavanamissakavanaphārusakavanādīsu satte passati mahāsampattiṃ anubhavamāne,
atk-s0517a:1392_7: So evaṃ manasi karoti “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantī”ti.
atk-s0517a:1392_13: Dibbacakkhupādakāneva hi imāni dibbacakkhunā saheva ijjhanti.
atk-s0517a:1393_0: Ime vata bhontotiādīsu imeti dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhānaṃ nidassanavacanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1393_9: Ariyānaṃ upavādakāti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi anatthakāmā hutvā
atk-s0517a:1393_14: “natthi imesaṃ jhānaṃ vā vimokkho vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā”tiādīni vadanto guṇaparidhaṃsanena upavadatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1393_15: So ca jānaṃ vā upavadeyya ajānaṃ vā,
atk-s0517a:1393_20: tena gantvā sace attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti,
atk-s0517a:1393_24: vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0517a:1393_28: sayaṃ vā gantvā saddhivihārikādike vā pesetvā khamāpetabbo.
atk-s0517a:1393_29: Sace nāpi gantuṃ na pesetuṃ sakkā hoti,
atk-s0517a:1393_31: tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sace navakatarā honti,
atk-s0517a:1393_36: khamatu me so āyasmā”ti vatvā khamāpetabbo.
atk-s0517a:1393_41: ekassa paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0517a:1393_48: Tenāpi ariyassa gatadisābhimukhena añjaliṃ paggahetvā “khamathā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1393_50: parinibbutamañcaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yāva sivathikaṃ gantvāpi khamāpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1394_2: ye ca micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti.
atk-s0517a:1394_4: manoduccaritaggahaṇena ca micchādiṭṭhiyā saṅgahitāyapi imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puna vacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1394_8: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya,
atk-s0517a:1394_9: evaṃsampadamidaṃ sāriputta vadāmi taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto,
atk-s0517a:1394_11: Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha – “nāhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1395_5: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā apetattā,
atk-s0517a:1395_8: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gati duggati.
atk-s0517a:1395_10: vinassantā vā ettha patanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgātipi vinipāto.
atk-s0517a:1396_4: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā,
atk-s0517a:1396_7: So hi yathāvuttena atthena apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi ca vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1397_5: So sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho.
atk-s0517a:1397_7: Evaṃ dibbena cakkhunā passatīti ayamettha saṅkhepatthoti.
atk-s0517a:1400_0: Imesu pañcasu ñāṇesu iddhividhañāṇaṃ parittamahaggataatītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena sattasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
atk-s0517a:1404_2: Kati ṭhānāni gacchatīti ekekassa uppattiṭṭhānaniyamanatthaṃ pucchā.
atk-s0517a:1404_3: Ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchatīti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne uppajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1404_6: Indriyānaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīsu tīsu ekekameva adhikaṃ hotīti dassanatthaṃ saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhaparivāraṃ hotītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1404_7: Yathā “saddhindriyassa adhimokkhaṭṭho”tiādīsu adhimokkhādayo saddhindriyādīnaṃ kiccavasena vuttā,
atk-s0517a:1404_8: evamidhāpi “adhimokkhaparivāraṃ hotī”ti saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhatthena parivāraṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1404_11: Paññindriyanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyameva pajānanasabhāvadassanatthaṃ visuṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1404_12: Abhidhammepi hi paññāya kiccavisesadassanatthaṃ maggakkhaṇe ca phalakkhaṇe ca ekāva paññā aṭṭhadhā vibhattā.
atk-s0517a:1404_13: Abhisandanaparivāranti nhāniyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya cittacetasikānaṃ sinehanakiccena parivāraṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1404_21: Vattamānajīvitindriyassa uparipavattiyā ca paccayattā pubbāparavasena pavattasantatiyā adhipatibhāvena anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa parivāraṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1405_0: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātā dhammātiādi sabbesaṃ maggasampayuttakānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1405_1: Tattha maggakkhaṇe jātāti maggasamuṭṭhitā eva, na aññe.
atk-s0517a:1405_2: Yasmā pana maggasamuṭṭhitampi rūpaṃ kusalādināmaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0517a:1405_3: tasmā taṃ apanento ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpanti āha.
atk-s0517a:1405_4: Sabbeva hi te dhammā kucchitānaṃ salanādīhi atthehi kusalā.
atk-s0517a:1405_5: Te ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā natthi etesaṃ āsavāti anāsavā.
atk-s0517a:1405_6: Vaṭṭamūlaṃ chindantā nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vaṭṭato niyyantīti niyyānikā.
atk-s0517a:1405_7: Kusalākusalasaṅkhātā cayā apetattā apacayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanato apacayaṃ gacchantīti apacayagāmino,
atk-s0517a:1405_9: Loke apariyāpannabhāvena lokato uttarā uttiṇṇāti lokuttarā.
atk-s0517a:1406_0: Imāni aṭṭhindriyānītiādi pubbe vuttaparivārabhāvassa ca tena sahagatādibhāvassa ca ādivuttaākārānañca dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1406_1: Tattha aṭṭhindriyānīti pubbe vuttanayena paññindriyena saha aṭṭha.
atk-s0517a:1406_2: Sahajātaparivārāti aṭṭhasu ekekena saha itare itare satta sahajātā hutvā tassa sahajātaparivārā honti.
atk-s0517a:1406_3: Tatheva aññaṃ aññassa aññaṃ aññassāti evaṃ aññamaññaparivārā honti.
atk-s0517a:1406_4: Tatheva aññamaññaṃ nissayaparivārā sampayuttaparivārā ca honti.
atk-s0517a:1406_5: Sahagatāti tena anaññātaññassāmītindriyena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatā.
atk-s0517a:1407_0: Phalakkhaṇe jātā dhammā sabbeva abyākatā hontīti rūpassapi abyākatattā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpena saha vuttā.
atk-s0517a:1407_1: Maggasseva kusalattā niyyānikattā apacayagāmittā ca phalakkhaṇe “kusalā”ti ca “niyyānikā”ti ca “apacayagāmino”ti ca na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1407_3: Tattha aṭṭhaṭṭhakānīti aṭṭhasu maggaphalesu ekekassa aṭṭhakassa vasena aṭṭha indriyaaṭṭhakāni.
atk-s0517a:1407_6: Idha arahattamaggavajjheyeva āsave avatvā sesamaggattayavajjhānampi vacanaṃ āsavakkhayavacanasāmaññamattena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1407_7: Arahattamaggañāṇameva hi keci āsave asesetvā āsavānaṃ khepanato “khaye ñāṇa”nti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1410_2: Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇantiādi anantaracatukke viya ekābhisamayavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1410_5: Anubodhañāṇaṃ ādikammikassa anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati,
atk-s0517a:1410_8: Lokuttaraṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo,
atk-s0517a:1410_15: Taṃ pana lokuttarampi “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni nāmāni labhatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1410_17: Tasmāyeva ca tattha katamaṃ dukkhe ñāṇantiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1411_2: Paññātiādīsu tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena paññā,
atk-s0517a:1411_3: tena tena vā aniccādinā pakārena dhamme jānātītipi paññā.
atk-s0517a:1411_11: Sā eva upasagganānattena upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇāti vuttā.
atk-s0517a:1411_12: Bhusaṃ lakkhaṇā te te aniccādidhamme paṭicca upalakkhaṇāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1411_22: Ayampi saṇhaṭṭhena vitthataṭṭhena ca bhūrī viyāti bhūrī.
atk-s0517a:1411_23: Atha vā paññāyeva bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrīti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1411_24: Asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā,
atk-s0517a:1411_27: taṃ attahitapaṭipattiyaṃ sampayuttadhamme ca yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhe parinetīti pariṇāyikā.
atk-s0517a:1411_31: Uppathapaṭipanne sindhave vīthiāropanatthaṃ patodo viya uppathe dhāvanakaṃ kūṭacittaṃ vīthiāropanatthaṃ vijjhatīti patodo viya patodo.
atk-s0517a:1412_3: Nayidaṃ “purisassa indriyaṃ purisindriya”ntiādi viya paññāya indriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1412_4: Atha kho paññā eva indriyaṃ paññindriyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1412_11: Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu ekālokā ekobhāsā ekapajjotā hoti.
atk-s0517a:1412_13: Imesu pana tīsu padesu ekapadenāpi etasmiṃ atthe siddhe yāni panetāni bhagavatā “cattārome,
atk-s0517a:1412_30: Attho hi anekehi ākārehi vibhajjamāno suvibhatto hoti,
atk-s0517a:1412_33: Ratikaraṇaṭṭhena pana ratidāyakaṭṭhena ratijanakaṭṭhena cittīkataṭṭhena dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena atulaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a:1413_1: sayaṃ vā ārammaṇe na muyhatīti amoho.
atk-s0517a:1413_6: so na kevalaṃ mohato añño dhammo,
atk-s0517a:1413_7: mohassa pana paṭipakkho dhammavicayasaṅkhāto amoho nāma idha adhippeto”ti.
atk-s0517a:1413_11: tattha katamaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇa”nti pucchāvacanāni saṅkhepavasena vuttānīti.
atk-s0517a:1416_1: Suddhikapaṭisambhidāñāṇaniddese imesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ pabhedābhāvatoyeva heṭṭhā viya pabhedaṃ adassetvāyeva atthesu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1416_2: Paññāpabhedābhāvepi attanā paṭividdhacatusaccadhammamattavasena nānattasabbhāvato atthanānatte paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1416_16: “jotane virocane pakāsane”ti arahato vasena vuttanti evampettha yojanā kātabbāti.
atk-s0517a:1425_1: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇaniddese tathāgatassāti vacane uddese sarūpato avijjamānepi “cha ñāṇāni asādhāraṇāni
atk-s0517a:1425_3: Tasmā uddese atthato siddhassa tathāgatavacanassa niddese gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1425_4: Satte passatīti rūpādīsu chandarāgena sattatāya laggatāya sattā,
atk-s0517a:1425_5: te satte indriyaparopariyattañāṇena cakkhunā passati oloketi.
